story:
Greetings,

Chester’s Cherries was an idea that came to life in an apartment speakeasy in the winter of 2016 in NYC. It started with a love of cocktails, the bar industry, and a taste for delicious cocktail cherries that were hard to please. That winter, we crafted our original formula to develop a cocktail cherry that embodied bolder flavors of the season, like cinnamon, nutmeg, and other warming spices. Draped initially in a decadent, cherry, liquid liquor brew.

During the Sumer of 2019, we elevated the original recipe and are releasing our signature Italian Amarena Cherries in a sweet, decadently spiced syrup. We add elements from the original formula to a final product that can be enjoyed all year round.

Move over cheap bleached cherries, the Cherry King has arrived, and we’re cherry bombing the cocktail scene for years to come. ​

Sincerely,

Chester’s Cherries® - The Cocktail Cherry King®

 

 

Pair Our Cherries With:

 

✔  Cocktails & Mocktails

 

✔ Manhattans, Old-Fashions, Sazerac's, Tom Collins, Cherry Martinis, etc.

 

✔ Sparkling Water or Sodas (use the syrup!) 

 

✔ Ice-cream, Sorbet or Yogurt

 

✔ Desserts

 

✔ Breakfast 

 

or eat them right out the jar!

 

The "Other Guys" Cherries

 

1. Low In Nutrients

Maraschino cherries lose many vitamins and minerals during the bleaching and brining process. These types of cherries are stripped of their color and flavor. They are then injected with Red40 and other artificial flavors and colors to give them that "Cherry like" profile. 

 

2. Processing Destroys Antioxidants

Maraschino cherries lose their natural, antioxidant-rich pigments through the bleaching and brining process. This makes them a neutral yellow color before they’re dyed.

 

3. Made with High-Fructose Corn Syrup 

They’re typically sold suspended in a high-fructose corn syrup (HFCS) solution. HFCS is a sweetener made from corn syrup that’s composed of fructose and glucose. It’s often found in sweetened beverages, candy, and processed foods.

 

4. May cause allergic reactions or behavioral changes

Red 40, also called Allura Red, is the most common food dye used in making maraschino cherries.

It’s derived from petroleum distillates or coal tars and regulated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) (25Trusted Source). Red 40 has been shown to cause allergic reactions and hyperactivity in people with food dye sensitivities. True allergies to food dyes are considered rare, though they may contribute to certain cases of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) (26Trusted Source, 27).

 

5. May increase your risk of bladder cancer

Maraschino cherries are artificially dyed with Red 40 to make them very bright red. This dye contains small amounts of the known carcinogen benzidine (34Trusted Source, 35Trusted Source).

Observational studies show that people exposed to benzidine have a higher risk of bladder cancer. Much of the research is on the effects of occupational exposure to benzidine, which is found in many substances made with industrial chemicals and colorings, like hair dye, paint, plastics, metals, fungicide, cigarette smoke, car exhaust, and foods (36Trusted Source, 37, 38).

 

 

Competition Comparison (Compared to Leading Brands)

  • Save up to 73% per oz
  • More Cherries, Less Syrup (Most Brands use 50% Liquid; 50% Cherries, or less!) 
  • We don't taste like cough syrup! (Personal opinion, compared to our competition) 
  • Buy More, Save More! (Special Quantities for Restaurants & Bars) 
  •  Bartender Tested, Patron Approved
  • Locally Made 

 

 

What will Chester's Cherries do with $10,000? 

 

Production & Supply Chain: Moving from shared kitchens into a co-packer takes costs of production to the next level. Transitioning to a co-packer is a necessary step for scaling and meeting food safety requirements. Output includes both supplies and ingredients needed to create our product, co-packer fees, shipping, and eventual supply chain distribution.

Licensing & Legal Fees: Starting a new business is complicated, particularly one within the food industry, as food safety and production regulations are of our highest importance. We will use a portion of the funds to cover our licensing and legal fees for getting the business up to standards and ensuring our co-packer production facilities are up to regulations.

Kosher and Fair Trade Certifications: Chester's Cherries already meet the standards for Kosher and Fair Trade certifications, but the process of getting certified and getting permission to use these logos cost time and money. These certifications are necessary and incredibly essential steps in the next level of expansion and our ability to position Chesters Cherries being a trusted brand.

Marketing Materials and Packaging: We are always researching the most cost-effective and alluring ways available to package our products with the consumer and bar industries in mind. We also want to invest a small amount into awareness programs through social media advertising and events and partnerships moving forward.

New Website:  We’ll update our online presence with our new look, as well as add functionality and efficiency of our current website. As our vision has shifted a bit, we need the esthetics and e-Commerce capabilities to grow in the same direction.

 

 

Shipping

We charge slightly higher shipping fees for each tier.  Please note that International shipping may receive delays as food items can typically be held up in customs. 

 

About the Founder:

Christopher, 32, NY

If an Old Fashioned, a Manhattan and a Boulevardier had a baby.

Advertising Executive by day. Cherry King by Night.

 

Other ways to help

  • Share your ideas, feedback, and questions: christopher@chesterscherries.com
  • Share this page on your social media profiles and add the tags: #ChestersCherries #TheCocktailCherryKing
  • Follow us on IG: @ChestersCherries 
  • Follow us in Twitter @ChesterCherries 
  • Follow us on YouTube  (Coming Soon!) 
  • Give Satoshi's (BTC address below)

 

Risks and challenges

Countless. But with no risk, there is no reward. Each failure will bring new learnings, and with new learnings come successes. This is a learning process for me, so if you have any recommendations, please message me.

story:
WHO WE ARE

The Nest presents También: a new Nest experience and a fresh take on the original classic. También is a love letter to you, our amazing guests. The ones who have stuck with us from day one as well as everyone who has recently discovered their love for breakfast delivery during COVID-19. If you know The Nest, you know there are pain points at our wonderful, little original location; from minimal parking, long wait times for a table (or for pick up), to desperately wanting a mimosa or beer with your Sunday Bacon Waffle while you are out with your people. The good news…También (as we like to call it) was designed with a goal of solving all those pain points for you. Ultimately, we decided to keep foraging ahead even despite the social climate, the pandemic, and all the obstacles we are all dealing with so that we could provide you some hope and not just new normalcy but something dope to look forward to.

WHY A NEW SPACE?

We wanted you to be able drive up and park without having to walk blocks, to not have to wait 45-60 minutes for a table, to have outdoor/patio dining options, to grab a drink with your friends and family over a meal or after a long day to unwind. We have heard your feedback and we are so close to opening our doors to be able to continue to provide you with dope food, fresh vibes, and counter cultural service. 

Will you partner with us to finalize this dream and help push this project into fruition? We sure hope so, this will be another exciting journey and we need you to be a part of it!

TAKING CARE OF PEOPLE, LIKE YOU!

In keeping with our mission, “Taking Care of People,” we ventured to utilize and partner with local vendors, architects, and restaurant specialists to help with the design, planning, and execution of this project. With each of you in mind, we went to the drawing board to create a unique space to house our vision so that we can continue to not only take care of people but to recognize those who have made us who we are. Be on the lookout for the easter eggs that nod to our original location and the cultural and pop cultural elements strategically placed that showcase our diverse customers. 

THE IMPACT/THE OPPORTUNITY

También is a wonderfully large space (over 3,000 square feet) with great character. This location is housed on the busiest street in Bellflower, CA and is guaranteed to be the place for all your dining needs from brunch to a  quick lunch spot to ultimately a private intimate dinner spot for celebrations. The Nest: También will NOT replace our OG location on Alondra Blvd but will instead offer an alternative experience. You can gather and enjoy an elevated menu with more lifestyle options to suit your changing dietary needs or it can be your place to just grab a mimosa or breakfast cocktail. You’ll be reminded of why you started coming to The Nest in the first place, and also have an opportunity to be a part of the future (both yours and ours together) as we navigate this new day in food and service. 

With 3000 square feet in the dining areas alone, we have more than doubled our seating capacity. With five different and unique areas in the restaurant, También aims to offer experiences. If you are on the patio you can have an upbeat, lively experience with great music under the southern california sun. If you are at the large, extended thirty seat bar you will feel the breeze from the outside but have more face time with your bartender. If you are in the main area you will get the food hall experience that we are most known for at our current location. We also have a family style dining room off to the side with a huge communal table and an adjacent multi-purpose room that can be closed off or opened up depending on your desires. There might even be a hidden room for private tastings. 

Our kitchen space has nearly tripled in size from our cozy kitchen at the OG Nest. A larger kitchen not only means quicker ticket times so that you get your food sooner but also means we have the space and capacity to expand our offerings. With this brand new kitchen we will be able to offer exciting and unique pop-ups, showcase guest chefs, provide outreach to the community through kitchen partnerships, and so much more. One vision we have is for our kitchen to be a female led and run kitchen. It is worth noting that our deepest desire is to have this kitchen run by women of color. When there are so many pain points in today's culture (even within the restaurant industry) pertaining to people of color and especially women of color we cannot think of a better triumph than to help those marginalized to succeed, shape, and lead También.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

At the commencement of this funding campaign, the space is 75% complete with the remaining 25% faithfully moving forward in the coming weeks. We are sprinting towards getting open but really wanted to open up a chance for our people to partner with us to finish this project. We have some fantastic perks available for you that are exciting and will provide you exclusive access to The Nest: También and all it’s experiences. We hope you will join us in this next chapter. As always we cannot do it without you. Help partner with us as we continue to take care of people. 

OUR ASK: Help us buy our bar and patio. In order to finalize the bar and patio areas of the restaurant we need to raise $100,000. These funds will go to finalizing the patio space (seating, privacy wall, lighting fixtures), bar space, and securing a full liquor license. We know a major pain point for our guests is not being able to enjoy a glass of champagne, or mimosa, blood mary, or fun breakfast cocktail with their meal. Then you add in the complexities of COVID-19 and outdoor dining is not longer a luxury but a necessity. We want to finish our beverage build out with great fixtures and furniture, awesome counter space, and of course great drinks and selections for you and your friends and family and apply for a full liquor license to enhance your experience even more. This will also allow us to move into a lunch and dinner concept faster. This is one of our last steps and your contribution will go directly to helping us finish the bar and patio areas and get you enjoying a guava mimosa or craft beer on our outdoor patio as soon as possible.

WHAT YOU GET:

SWAG:

  • Mugs, pint glasses, special edition t-shirts

RECOGNITION:

  • Social media shout out, a drink on the menu named after you, your picture on our gallery wall, your name on a table or chair

INSIDER PASSES:

  • Friends and family soft opening pass with two drink tickets, pick a beer on tap for a 1 month rotation, bartending lesson for two with a También bartender, private cooking class for two with the También chef, free brunch and cocktail for a year, private dinner for 6

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We know that some of you may be interested in making a larger contribution or looking into investor options, if this is you please contact Antonio directly at antonio@eatnest.com

Lastly, we know that some people just cannot contribute financially at the moment. Don't be discouraged! You can still help. Please share our link on your social media pages, or pass our information on to someone you know who might be able to make a pledge. 

Help us make The Nest: También a reality. I cannot wait to take care of you and yours! - Antonio

story:
Short Summary

Hey there! We are Miri Plowman and Gabriel Skoda the owners of a food enterprise in Seattle, comprised of Miri's Snack Shack, Miri's Poffertjes and Miri's Catering. We collectively have over 20 years of experience in the food service industry, and have been in business and in love for three years! We are in the process of opening our new venture--a beach cafe located in the heart of Golden Gardens-- one of Seattle's most beautiful parks! The opportunity is so unique-- our cafe will serve the parks attendees with delicious food and beverages and will also activate the park through inclusive events that will be fun for the whole family. (Think campfire sing along nights, and puppy brunches!) We are asking for $20,000.00 to help us complete our remodel, create outdoor seating, and market our new space to the public. Please help us open and further our success, so that we can serve this magical place and the people who visit it the best that we can!

What We Need & What You Get

We are so close! We have renovated the interior including electrical and plumbing, fresh paint (Gabe did most of it!), and the majority of the equipment! However the exterior will be the seriously important component of getting the attention of park goers. Most people who use Golden Gardens are accustomed to there not being a significant eatery here, and we have to really make our presence KNOWN to get the attention of the public!

Seating: Outdoor seating that can be easily moved but sturdy enough to last and to not get stolen. ($4k) 

Signage/branding: We are in the process of redoing our logo ($2k), and once this is complete we will design a sign for the exterior ($2k) and have our sign hung ($500.00). In addition we'll need marketing materials like posters, postcards, sandwich boards ($1+k).

Planters and beautification: Planters have to be sturdy enough to withhold the wind and tricksters that may try to tip it over or drag them to the ocean! (1k)

Walk-in Refrigerator: The refrigerator is ($5.5k) hardwiring the fridge ($1k)

Marketing/events: As we open, we would like to reach as many different groups of people as possible to increase our visibility and ensure our success. This means spending money on marketing and events that will engage varying sectors of the public. This last 4k is money that will go directly back into community events that activate park and the space around the concession. Examples include: A Grand Opening Party, Sponsoring Bonfires, Sponsoring Musicians/Face-painters/Yoga and fitness instructors to offer free classes for the public, and more! 

If we don't reach our entire goal, we'll still be able to do a great deal on this list accomplished! We're asking for this money to ensure that we open with as much support and potential for success as possible. Because let's be honest, opening a food establishment is risky! The margins are small, and the first year is the hardest. This money will also allow us to HIRE sooner, which will allow us to retain the revenue streams that we already have in place. We're hoping to put as many cards in our favor as we can so that we might continue to be the stewards of Golden Gardens and help activate the park for many years to come. If we make MORE than we need through this campaign the funds will be solely used for creating even more events and programming for the public.

The Impact

Opening a business in a Seattle Public Park poses numerous opportunities to intersect environment, culture and community. In opening our small concession at Golden Gardens our goal is to:

-SERVE: All people that enjoy the park with equality, respect and joy.

-PROVIDE: High quality, affordable, and thoughtful food and drinks that accommodate cultural, socioeconomic and dietary needs.

-CREATE: Inclusive events that draw from the varied needs the community and encourages people from all parts of the city and beyond to utilize, adore and develop memories in this magnificent park.

-STEWARD: Golden Gardens and The Salish Sea through conscious packaging and limited plastic and single use products in our venue. 

-COLLABORATE: With non profit organizations and businesses that are also passionate about Golden Gardens, Seattle's Public Spaces, The Great Outdoors, and Free and family focused activities.

-SUPPORT: Local and sustainable agriculture and other local small producers through purchasing power.

In the end, I still believe that the entrepreneurial spirit has the potential to move forward causes of social and environmental justice. It is our intention to be an exemplar of this ethos. 

Risks & Challenges

Gabe and I have been in business for over 3 years. In those three years we have made calculated moves, growing our business slowly and intentionally. We have managed until now to take on no debt for our business, and operate at a profit. We have done this by maintaining low overhead and few employees, and many a 100+ hour work week. 

In this new step we will hire multiple employees, have higher monthly overhead, and take some of the "mobile flexibility" out of our business. Labor and overhead costs are expensive, but also allow us an opportunity to grow. Our ability to adapt has served us well over the years and will continue to do so. In addition, we are maintaining previous revenue streams while also increasing our capacity to generate income through the busy summer months at Golden Gardens. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We acknowledge that not everyone has the financial means to support our business in this way. In addition, there are so many brilliant ideas, causes and struggles vying for financial resources, how do you choose what you can and can't support! We believe that if you are supporting causes that are important to you then you are also vicariously supporting our cause! So thank you, and you do you!

Please still join us in celebration at our May 12th celebration, and any other event we sponsor or host!

Please like, follow and share our Crowdfunding Campaign and our Grand Opening with those that may be excited about our project or would like to collaborate with us.

Please just send us some positive juju as we dive into this new adventure head first!

We collectively have over 20 years of experience in the food service industry, and have been in business and in love for three years! We are in the process of opening our new venture--a beach cafe located in the heart of Golden Gardens-- one of Seattle's most beautiful parks! The opportunity is so unique-- our cafe will serve the parks attendees with delicious food and beverages and will also activate the park through inclusive events that will be fun for the whole family. (Think campfire sing along nights, and puppy brunches!) We are asking for $20,000.00 to help us complete our remodel, create outdoor seating, and market our new space to the public. Please help us open and further our success, so that we can serve this magical place and the people who visit it the best that we can!

What We Need & What You Get
We are so close! We have renovated the interior including electrical and plumbing, fresh paint (Gabe did most of it!), and the majority of the equipment! However the exterior will be the seriously important component of getting the attention of park goers. Most people who use Golden Gardens are accustomed to there not being a significant eatery here, and we have to really make our presence KNOWN to get the attention of the public!
Seating: Outdoor seating that can be easily moved but sturdy enough to last and to not get stolen. ($4k) 
Signage/branding: We are in the process of redoing our logo ($2k), and once this is complete we will design a sign for the exterior ($2k) and have our sign hung ($500.00). In addition we'll need marketing materials like posters, postcards, sandwich boards ($1+k).
Planters and beautification: Planters have to be sturdy enough to withhold the wind and tricksters that may try to tip it over or drag them to the ocean! (1k)
Walk-in Refrigerator: The refrigerator is ($5.5k) hardwiring the fridge ($1k)
Marketing/events: As we open, we would like to reach as many different groups of people as possible to increase our visibility and ensure our success. This means spending money on marketing and events that will engage varying sectors of the public. This last 4k is money that will go directly back into community events that activate park and the space around the concession. Examples include: A Grand Opening Party, Sponsoring Bonfires, Sponsoring Musicians/Face-painters/Yoga and fitness instructors to offer free classes for the public, and more! 
If we don't reach our entire goal, we'll still be able to do a great deal on this list accomplished! We're asking for this money to ensure that we open with as much support and potential for success as possible. Because let's be honest, opening a food establishment is risky! The margins are small, and the first year is the hardest. This money will also allow us to HIRE sooner, which will allow us to retain the revenue streams that we already have in place. We're hoping to put as many cards in our favor as we can so that we might continue to be the stewards of Golden Gardens and help activate the park for many years to come. If we make MORE than we need through this campaign the funds will be solely used for creating even more events and programming for the public.

The Impact
Opening a business in a Seattle Public Park poses numerous opportunities to intersect environment, culture and community. In opening our small concession at Golden Gardens our goal is to:
-SERVE: All people that enjoy the park with equality, respect and joy.
-PROVIDE: High quality, affordable, and thoughtful food and drinks that accommodate cultural, socioeconomic and dietary needs.
-CREATE: Inclusive events that draw from the varied needs the community and encourages people from all parts of the city and beyond to utilize, adore and develop memories in this magnificent park.
-STEWARD: Golden Gardens and The Salish Sea through conscious packaging and limited plastic and single use products in our venue. 
-COLLABORATE: With non profit organizations and businesses that are also passionate about Golden Gardens, Seattle's Public Spaces, The Great Outdoors, and Free and family focused activities.
-SUPPORT: Local and sustainable agriculture and other local small producers through purchasing power.
In the end, I still believe that the entrepreneurial spirit has the potential to move forward causes of social and environmental justice. It is our intention to be an exemplar of this ethos. 

Risks & Challenges
Gabe and I have been in business for over 3 years. In those three years we have made calculated moves, growing our business slowly and intentionally. We have managed until now to take on no debt for our business, and operate at a profit. We have done this by maintaining low overhead and few employees, and many a 100+ hour work week. 
In this new step we will hire multiple employees, have higher monthly overhead, and take some of the "mobile flexibility" out of our business. Labor and overhead costs are expensive, but also allow us an opportunity to grow. Our ability to adapt has served us well over the years and will continue to do so. In addition, we are maintaining previous revenue streams while also increasing our capacity to generate income through the busy summer months at Golden Gardens. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
We acknowledge that not everyone has the financial means to support our business in this way. In addition, there are so many brilliant ideas, causes and struggles vying for financial resources, how do you choose what you can and can't support! We believe that if you are supporting causes that are important to you then you are also vicariously supporting our cause! So thank you, and you do you!
Please still join us in celebration at our May 12th celebration, and any other event we sponsor or host!
Please like, follow and share our Crowdfunding Campaign and our Grand Opening with those that may be excited about our project or would like to collaborate with us.
Please just send us some positive juju as we dive into this new adventure head first!

story:
I’m Tom Coughlan, the chef and owner of Lunch Different; a direct-to-office catering company I’m working to start in New York City. I need your help to get started and that’s why I’m reaching out here on Indiegogo. There is no such thing as a free lunch and I need money to get my business started.

Lunch at the office is often rushed, impersonal and unhealthy. The choices are leftovers, something quick, something cheap, or something bad for you and no one has time for a full week of meal prep. So usually it becomes some mix of all these. But as more companies are buying their employees lunch they are finding an improvement in company culture and productivity along with a satiated staff. People get the chance to engage with their fellow employees in an unforced social environment and share in humankind's oldest tradition, a meal.

Lunch Different will target the emerging market of employer purchased office lunches with local, seasonal and healthy options. This is not lunch catered by Shake Shack. This is real food, prepared by an experienced chef and delivered directly to the office to be enjoyed.

I’ve been a chef in New York City for over six years, working at various establishments ranging from small cafes to Michelin starred restaurants. Last year I opened Sunken Hundred as the executive chef and received high praise from the local and national food press. But I am leaving the restaurant scene behind to focus on Lunch Different and bring lunch right to your office.

In order to get started I am asking for $8000 to cover my startup costs. In return I’m offering some great and unique perks for those that donate.

Please donate now and I hope to see you for lunch soon!

story:
HOME is where The Hybrid Chef belongs!  

My name is Tim Armstrong, and I am The Hybrid Chef.  I plan, prepare and deliver high quality meals to your front door.  Clean up becomes is a breeze, allowing you to focus on eating clean, healthy and flavorful food while making memories to last a lifetime.  

In addition to meal delivery, I am available for home and office catering, private parties and in-home events for you to enjoy with friends and family.

 

TODAY...

Many of you that followed me over the past 18 months know that business continues to grow. However, because I don't have my own kitchen, I have maximized my growth.    

 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

 I have found the perfect home in the epicenter of my client base here in Abacoa.  The location would allow me to have my own kitchen and retail area on the first floor and a living space for me and my family on the second.  Having a kitchen to call my own would allow me to offer cooking classes, birthday parties, summer camps, private dining, wine dinners and theme nights such as Taco Tuesday.  It will also allow me to expand my menu offerings and extend my soup, muffin and dessert lines.  

What Do I Need?

The entire purchase price of the location, including kitchen equipment and build out is over $600,000.  We are seeking to raise $200,000 to secure the space and outfit a kitchen that I can call HOME.

It is time to take The Hybrid Chef to a new level of healthy, tasty and convenient right in your back yard.  I look forward to welcoming clients into my new space and better serving my community.

With your support, we can finally say "There is No Place Like Home."

For more information about this project and The Hybrid Chef, visit our website at www.thehybridchef.com and follow us on Facebook and Instagram @thehybridchef.

story:
Crystal Clear Ice Maker Molds

Whether your favorite refreshment is iced coffee or adult beverage, once you go clear you will never go back to ordinary ice. There are many cocktail ice makers on the market but only a few that actually make relatively clear ice. Having purchased these products and encountering one defect disappointment or another, I set out to perfect the clear ice mold. Clear ice won't actually make your cocktail taste better, but it sure seems that way! 

Don't ruin the enjoyment of your fine iced coffee or premium bourbon whiskey brand by using cloudy ice! A single, oversized ice ball in your cocktail slows down the melting process and won't dilute your cocktail as fast as ordinary ice.

The design goal with the TuVuoi (pronounced 'two-voy', Italian for You Want) ice mold is to make the largest and clearest ice possible. By studying the other brand ice makers I was able to improve the quality and performance of the ice mold. Many of these other brands even use fake ice in their advertising photos to make you think their molds produce ice which is clearer than it actually is! After 6 months of design, prototyping, and testing, I have created the best clear cocktail ice freezer molds possible. Every picture I use is of actual ice from the mold!

The Top-Down Freeze Method

As ice freezes in a typical ice tray, it creates air pockets inside the ice which will make the ice appear cloudy. To create clear ice, the freeze process must be carefully controlled by insulating the ice mold on all sides except the top. This forces the ice to form from the top down.

Don't be fooled by those other ice molds that claim to make clear ice. There is only one way to make clear ice from a freezer mold and any ice mold that does not also contain an insulated reservoir surrounding the ice mold will not make crystal clear ice, no matter how pure your water is!

Much like a lake freezes in winter, as the ice freezes from the top down our ice maker pushes the air bubbles into the reservoir beneath the actual cavity in the ice mold. This leaves the ice to form inside the mold cavity with as few flaws in clarity and purity as possible.

Removing as many air bubbles as possible while the ice freezes will produce a near perfectly clear ice shape. A single, large and flawless ice shape is less likely to crack and break apart than cloudy ice which contains air pockets, spoiling your enjoyment.

I set out to perfect the top-down freeze method with the TuVuoi line of ice molds. I purchased every style of insulated clear ice maker on the market and after testing them all, I felt we could improve those designs to make the best ice maker possible.

About TuVuoi

Choose From Five Different Ice Molds

Share your passions with your friends over a cocktail with specialty ice. I will offer ice molds to make a golf ball, a large round sphere, a d20 board game dice, a 6-sided craps dice, or a diamond shaped ice.

We can even make a custom ice shape on special order.

The Golf Ball Ice Maker

The 6-Sided 'Craps" Dice Ice Maker

The d20 Board Game Dice Ice Maker

The Largest Sphere Ice Maker

The Diamond Ice Maker

How To Make Clear Cocktail Ice

Tap water can vary in quality from location to location. After using our ice maker and you are still experiencing some cloudiness in your ice, try experimenting with different water purity, warm water (not boiling!), freezer time, and increase your freezer temperature to about +10 Degrees F to slow the freezing cycle even more.

Simply fill the reservoir with your favorite water, allow it to sit to let any bubbles escape, then slowly lower the ice molds into the reservoir. Place in the freezer for 24-36 hours and remove the ice and place into your favorite refreshment!

Check out the extra images for detailed instructions.

What Comes In The Clear Ice Maker Kit

The TuVuoi ice maker is comprised only of top quality materials. The custom vacuum insulated tumbler is made from top quality 304 stainless steel, the insulation sleeve is made from neoprene foam, and the molds are made from FDA approved, BPA and Phthalates free silicone rubber. 

Each component of the TuVuoi ice maker is machine washable and fully recyclable.

Current State Of The Project

The TuVuoi ice molds are a fully designed and engineered product. I have built and tested many prototypes and are currently in production. The first 1000 units are in stock and are currently for sale and ready to ship to you.

What Are The Next Steps

I have nearly 40 years experience designing and producing all sorts of consumer products. This design as addressed and mitigated every conceivable challenge from functionality to producibility. The design is fully vetted and 1000 units have already been purchased and have landed at my Las Vegas location, and are ready to ship to you.

The Risks And Challenges

The design, engineering, and manufacturing has been completed. Every pledge will be fulfilled. There will be little to no waiting for those of you that commit early to secure one of the first 1000 units. In addition, as the campaign goes along and we approach the 1000 units sold, I will order yet another production run of 1000 (or more) units even before the campaign ends! This will set your wait time to absolutely minimum once this campaign has concluded.

If you would like a combination of more than one ice maker that is not listed in the rewards, send me a note and I will make it happen.

Shipping Details

All ice molds will ship by UPS ground to the 48 continuous states. Overseas shipping by UPS Worldwide. Outside of the 48 states, please send me a note with your postal code so that I can calculate costs to your location.

Shipments shall be made by UPS Ground. Packages lost prior to having been marked as delivered by shipper, shall be replaced at no cost to the purchaser. For purchases totaling more than $100, delivery signature shall be required. Items lost or stolen after marked as delivered by the shipper shall be the responsibility of the purchaser.

Want To See More? Check Out Our Website

For more information on the TuVuoi Ice Molds, please visit https://tuvuoi.com/ice-molds/

Summary

As a product designer, I have designed countless products for everyone from first time inventors, to start-up companies, to largest corporations and even government agencies. However now I am turning my attention to bring forward products of my own creation rather than just designing for others. The ice maker molds are the first of may unique new products that will be designed by me and my engineering team in the coming months and made available first here on IndieGoGo!

If you know of anyone that would be interested in a wholesale account send me a note.

The Rest Is Up To YOU! Cheers!

Other Ways You Can Help

We rely on you to spread the word and share this with your friends and neighbors that also need to experience the difference a large, clear ice shape makes to the enjoyment of a fine brand!

I would appreciate it if you could post the share button here on your social media pages!

story:
Elephant Cuppa is the first leakproof STRAW tumbler. It comes with a unique straw cap to keep your straw clean and dust free! It is extremely portable and can be used for any kind of drinks such as bubble tea, smoothies, milkshakes and more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Elephant Cuppa is not just a water bottle, it is also a shaker, boba cup, smoothie cup and snack jar in one! We've made it easy to carry and clean, so that you can bring it anywhere and can be used for any kind of drinks. Let's say goodbye to single-use products!


 

 

 

 

Elephant Cuppa is made from 100% BPA-free, bio-based ECOZEN plastic, making it resistant to impacts, stains and odors. The transparent Tumbler’s body has a beautiful, glass-like appearance. The markings on its side make it easy to measure its contents in seconds!

 

 

 

The Elephant Cuppa Bundle includes a premium 100% food grade Silicone Sleeve that can preserve your Elephant Cuppa and the contents. The Silicone Sleeve is BPA free, FDA-approved and dishwasher safe.

 

 

 

 “Change for the future ”

At Elephant Cuppa, we design our products with convenience of use and durability in mind. We aim to help reduce the use of disposable products, minimize pollution and damage to the environment caused by plastic waste.

More importantly, we want to convey our ideas on environmental protection through our products, increase public attention at eco-friendly products, trigger new thinking and creativity.

 

 

Follow Us

We've made it easy to carry and clean, so that you can bring it anywhere and can be used for any kind of drinks. story:
WE'RE COMMUNITY PEOPLE, NOT BUSINESS PEOPLE.

Ba & Me is a family-owned chain of Vietnamese restaurants in the Catskills and Poconos. We've been in business for over seven years, and in Honesdale, PA for over five. Throughout all these years, we've become a community anchor for Honesdale, by providing fresh, affordable food in an uplifting environment, served by a team of caring locals.

 

COVID-19 NEARLY KILLED US.

There was a point when we didn't think our restaurant in Honesdale would make it because of the pandemic. But with quick thinking, adapting, and dedication from our teams (and lots of hope), we pulled through!

 

AND THEN WE GOT EVICTED.

After surviving the economic effects of COVID19 and clawing our way back out of debt, we're now hit with another curveball: through no fault of our own, we were served an eviction notice from our landlord. Worse, we were given only 30 days to vacate the premises. In their words, "It's just business."

 

IT'S NOT OVER.

We're not going to call it quits just yet, not after how far we've come. And so, we're relocating, into a bigger and better Ba & Me in Honesdale. As of September, we've secured a Main Street location right across the street! To do so, we will need to invest at least $35,000 to cover our modest build-out for our new space. It's a lot for us, for anyone, for that matter. So, we've started this gift-card fundraiser to help raise a small portion to help offset the debt that we've been forced to take on.

 

THANK YOU.

Ba & Me has become an integral part of this resilient, strong, and beautiful community and we hope you feel that way too. With your support, we can remain here in Honesdale, PA for years to come.

story:
Elle's Cupcakery was inspired when I looked after a 7year old boy who had NEVER had a birthday cake- this was due to his allergies! So when I returned home to the UK I embarked on  the journey of starting my own company.

I Currently use my own car for deliveries but as cakes are getting bigger and better and I have more cases etc to take to markets I am in need  of a van!

This would make a massive difference to the business as it means I can make more deliveries to more places! It would also make getting around to farmers markets and event alot easier as I can fit my lovely market stall and display case in the van too!

If you donate there is Free cake on offer, and if you feel you cannot donate PLEASE help spread the word to family and friends using the sharing tools featured!
story_txt:
Elle's Cupcakery was inspired when I looked after a 7year old boy who had NEVER had a birthday cake- this was due to his allergies! So when I returned home to the UK I embarked on  the journey of starting my own company.
I Currently use my own car for deliveries but as cakes are getting bigger and better and I have more cases etc to take to markets I am in need  of a van!
This would make a massive difference to the business as it means I can make more deliveries to more places! It would also make getting around to farmers markets and event alot easier as I can fit my lovely market stall and display case in the van too!
If you donate there is Free cake on offer, and if you feel you cannot donate PLEASE help spread the word to family and friends using the sharing tools featured!

story:
Risks & Challenges

The Snow Monkey Team has spent countless hours vetting our partners, we only partner with ethical and reliable partners. Our suppliers are premium, our manufacturer abides to all health codes, and most of all we are very confident in our team to deliver and represent Snow Monkey in the greatest fashion. Whilst our Team, suppliers, vendors, and distributors are all committed to bring Subzero Superfood to you on time. Having said that, we can't control the Monkey business that life throws at us and there are always uncertainties and risks that could delay in the production of Subzero superfood. Although very unlikely, things sometimes do take longer than expected - but we are prepared to what it takes to avoid any wrinkles. Throughout the duration of the project, we will be in constant contact with you every step of the way, frequently updating you in great detail on all milestones and any foreseeable obstacles! Make sure we have the right email to contact you on!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you wanted to help us out but aren't in the US and the swag pack is not up your ally, please: 

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by Sharing this campaign on Facebook, Instagram and/or Twitter. You can also use the Indiegogo 'Sharing Tool.'

story:
Few things in life are as special as truly good coffee. The freshness. The flavour. The aroma. The uplifting sense of pure satisfaction and joy. Truly good coffee inspires, connects and confirms there are good things in the world after all. At the Roasting Depot, we love our coffee. And we’re dedicated to sharing this love with as many people as possible.

The crowdfunded coffee revolution!

A truly transparent farm to cup experience made possible by you the coffee lover.

Roastingdepot.com is partnering with master roaster, Jose Castillo, and the Santos Café farm in Panama to showcase a very rare micro-lot of Panamanian Geisha. This coffee is truly special. Sourced directly from a sustainable and ethical farm, where our master roaster knows everyone by first name. This coffee is literally the world’s best coffee, and we want to share it with those coffee lovers who will appreciate it most. Before we do that, however, we need you to show us just what this experience would mean to you. Purchasing this micro-lot involves a huge upfront investment, and shipping it to Perth, Australia, for our master roaster to roast it perfectly is not going to be easy. So, join us in the new revolution that is crowdfunded coffee- a complete farm to cup experience made possible by you the coffee lover!

What is Direct Trade coffee?

Direct trade coffee represents a collaborative and meaningful relationship between the farm and the roaster. Direct trade coffees are extremely rare (making up less than 1% of the world's coffee) and deliver an out of this world coffee experience. 

Your reward!

This truly is some of the best coffee in the world. Experiencing Panamanian Geisha coffee should be on every coffee lover's bucket list. The delicious flavour and aroma are something to behold and make this a truly amazing coffee.

This coffee is a micro-lot meaning there is a VERY LIMITED amount. To help as many coffee lovers as possible experience this once in a lifetime coffee, we are offering 200g (7 oz) packages of freshly roasted Panamanian Geisha coffee. The coffee will be supplied as a filter roast in whole beans so that you can grind is fresh just before brewing to maximise the flavour and aroma.

JOSE CASTILLO, MASTER ROASTER

"WE ARE GOING TO VERY CAREFULLY ROAST THIS COFFEE TO SHOWCASE THE ORIGIN OF THE BEANS AND DELIVER AN AMAZING TASTING COFFEE THAT IS GOING TO BLOW YOUR MIND!"

This coffee will be sourced via direct trade with the farm and that means your contribution goes directly to the hardworking team behind this amazing coffee. Your package of freshly roasted Panamanian Geisha coffee will arrive accompanied by a complete farm to cup story highlighting the life of the coffee, the people behind it and how your contribution makes a positive impact.

  • Producer: Mario Lezcano
  • Farm Name: Santos Café 
  • Growing Altitude: 1500 - 1700 masl
  • Region: Santa Clara, Renacimiento, Panama
  • Variety: Geisha 
  • Process: Washed and Natural
  • SCAA Cupping Score: 90.5 (Washed) and 91.8 (Natural)  
  • Best Brewing Method: Pour Over and Aeropress 

While we are intent on sharing all of the micro-lot, if we do not reach our target then no stress, everyone who has committed will still receive their coffee!  

Spread the love!

Beyond experiencing this amazing coffee for yourself, you can help the hard working and dedicated people behind this coffee by sharing the campaign with everyone you know, especially the coffee lovers in your life.

Your support means the world!

Thank you so much for your time and support in making crowdfunded coffee a reality and enriching both your life and the people who dedicate their life to producing such amazing coffee.

story:
Wine + Ice Cream: Made-to-order desserts for adults

Winecream combines the best of two worlds: super-premium, naturally sourced gourmet ice cream and craft-made fruit wines. The results are delicious, boozy frozen desserts.

How it Works

Winecream is made in individual 6 ounce servings that are mixed and flash frozen to order. 

A customer first chooses her wine from a variety of house-made options including strawberry, mixed berry, pineapple, or peach. The wine then is mixed with our super-premium ice cream base, and the customer may choose additional mix-ins including all-natural fruit purees, sliced fruit, nuts, and candy or cookie pieces.

Once a delicious liquid concoction is mixed up, it's flash frozen using liquid nitrogen, a food-safe cryogenic liquid that's nearly -320 degrees Fahrenheit. The result is a customized frozen dessert that's approximately 10% ABV - the alcoholic equivalent of the average glass of wine.

What We Need

So far, we've only been selling our delicious product at local food and wine festivals throughout Maryland. We'd love to end the vagrancy of our existence and expand the availability of Winecream by opening a brick-and-mortar storefront in our beloved hometown. Specifically, we're targeting the Highlandtown neighborhood in Southeast Baltimore.

To reach our goal, we'll need at least $25,000 to cover startup costs for our new location, which will cover things like kitchen equipment, permitting/license fees, furniture and fixtures, and other miscellaneous expenses.

A permanent location will allow us to serve even more Winecream to our awesome customers!

What You Get

In addition to our undying love and gratitude, as well as the satisfaction of knowing you are contributing to the renaissance of one of Baltimore’s most iconic Main Streets, donors to our campaign will receive some awesome perks. Plus, you'll be able to enjoy Winecream on a regular basis at our storefront instead of following us around from festival to festival - it's a win-win!

Want the awesome perks but running low on cash? We are now treating all referred contributions as if they were your own! Here's how it works: make an Indiegogo account (it's fast, easy and free!), then share our campaign via the social buttons located under our campaign video. All donations will be tracked automatically via Indiegogo (you can even check your progress by checking out your Indiegogo profile), and will be rewarded as if they were your own. So, if you share our link via the Indiegogo share buttons and ten of your friends donate $25 each, you are eligible for our $250 perk. Sharing is caring, people!!

Risks & Challenges

As with any business, there are clearly many risks and challenges - not the least of which include dealing with permits and zoning laws, keeping cash flow in the green, and effectively managing resources. But we've been doing this for some time now and have learned a LOT. With your support, we are confident we can handle anything this journey throws at us!

    Crossroad Company

    Crossroad Company, LLC is a small, family-owned business located in Baltimore, MD. We are the proud innovators of Winecream, which arose late one Christmas after a day of family togetherness that involved lots of wine and ice cream - separately. Eventually, we figured we'd just skip a step, and Winecream was born.

    FAQs

    This is awesome! Can you ship me a pint?

    We would love to be able to ship customized portions of Winecream across the country, and even the globe - but we're not there yet. We hope to offer direct-to-consumer shipping to select U.S. locations in 2015, but can't make any promises (and for this campaign, perks that include Winecream can only be redeemed in-person). For now, our product can only be purchased at select food and wine festivals in the Mid-Atlantic region. Check our website for the most up-to-date listing of events we'll be attending. Or, contribute to this campaign to help us get our storefront up and running!

    Do I have to be of legal drinking age to eat Winecream?

    Yes, because the product contains approximately 10% alcohol by volume, customers must be 21+ to enjoy. We check for a valid photo ID for all sales and samples. but don't worry - as a consolation prize we offer "virgin" concoctions for younger fans until they're old enough to enjoy the real thing.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Like us (www.facebook.com/Winecream), follow us (@_Winecream), and visit us at our next festival (full schedule of events can be found at www.crossroadco.com).

story:
Available now on Amazon

 

Featured In...

 

 

What Backers Are Saying

Lift Nutrition CEO Kevin Angsten explains why he will be carrying Ketone.io
 
Andrew Davis: "Ketone.io is awesome"
 
"It's better than any other ketone product on the market, that's for sure"
 
Fitness Enthusiast Alan Halsey Reviews Ketone.io
 

Kevin is getting back in shape with Ketone.io

 

The Ultimate Endurance Sports Drink

Sports drinks haven't changed in decades. They are full of sugar, artificial flavors, and mysterious chemicals. Ketone.io is here to change that.

Benefits — Ketone.io energizes, improves cognition, and supports healthy weight management... and it does all that without any sugar/carbohydrates. 

Ketone.io can also reduce hunger, replenish electrolytes, and it's ready to drink in a convenient plastic bottle.

 

Who should drink it — Ketone.io is great for driven athletes (especially endurance athletes), gym rats, or even the office warrior. Drink it in the morning, before training, during training, when you're competing, or when you just need to focus on a difficult task at work. We made Ketone.io to help you perform at your best.

 

Contact Us Directly

Got questions about Ketone.io, ketosis, or the ketogenic diet? Email us at contact@ltdlabs.com.

Visit our Facebook page

Visit our Twitter page

Visit our Instagram page

 

Energy from Ketones

With all the buzz going on today about ketogenic diets, we know people are eager to experience what ketosis feels like. Not familiar with ketosis, ketones, or all this ketogenic razzmatazz? We'll try to catch you up.

Ketosis — Let's start with ketosis. Ketosis is a metabolic state in which your body is not dependent on glucose (from carbohydrates/sugars), but instead relies on ketones. Ketones are unique little metabolites that form from the breakdown of fats. So when you are in ketosis, your body burns its fat stores to create ketones to fuel your cells. This ketone fuel is actually much more efficient than the fuel you would get from sugars.

Adenosine Triphosphate-- or ATP-- is the energy that the human body creates when combining oxygen with either carbohydrates or fats that we consume in our diets. The production of ATP happens inside each and every cell within a special organelle called the mitochondria. 

It has been well understood that our mitochondria are the sites of energy production and cellular respiration, a process dependent on using sugars and fats as substrates. Only recently has it been brought to the mainstream awareness that ketones, most specifically beta-hydroxybutyrate, can also be used by the mitochondria, and actually yield more energy in the form of ATP, compared to both fats and sugars.

 

Ketogenic diet — One way to fuel your cells with ketones is adopting a ketogenic diet. A ketogenic diet minimizes carb-intake to induce the state of ketosis. It is a fascinating trend with countless dedicated followers.

 

Ketones — If you don't want to follow a strict low-carb diet, you can supplement with ketones instead. Ketone.io can be taken in lieu of a ketogenic diet to help you experience the amazing benefits of ketosis. Ketone.io can also be taken while on a ketogenic diet, effectively amplifying the ketogenic state.

 

Ketone.io is for everyone — Don't get us wrong, we have a huge amount of respect for ketogenic dieters. That's why we made Ketone.io for both ketogenic dieters and non-ketogenic dieters.

 

Our Formula

We've partnered with Compound Solutions, the creators of goBHB™ Ketones, to bring you the first-ever ready-to-drink source of ketones. Ketone.io is exogenous ketones (in the form of beta-hydroxybutyrate), electrolytes, and natural flavoring. That's it.

 

At Limited Labs, transparency is paramount — Unlike so many other nutritional supplement manufacturers, we will always disclose every part of our product's formula. You will never see the words proprietary blend on Ketone.io's nutritional panel. Instead, you will see a break-down of our entire formula, and we will always do our best to educate our supporters on the ingredients we chose for Ketone.io.

 

Premium ketones in Ketone.io — We have partnered with Compound Solutions, the makers of goBHB™ Ketones, to ensure that Ketone.io is formulated with the most cutting-edge ingredients available today.

 

A Trim Product — Our minimalistic formula is sugar-free (zero net carbs), fat-free, and it contains less than 50 calories. 

 

Natural Ingredients — We are proud to present Ketone.io as a sports drink that contains NO artificial sweeteners, NO artificial flavors, and it's GMO-free. 

 

3 Refreshing Flavors — Our first batch of Ketone.io will be produced in three great-tasting citrus flavors.

Plus, those who back Ketone.io at the Ketone.io Champion level ($5,000 pledge) will get to create their own flavors! 

 

Our Story

We started Limited Labs in 2015 to create nutritional products that elevate the human experience. We wanted to maximize our customers' performance in all the things they do. We've had a number of successful nutritional products, but Ketone.io will take us to the next level in performance lifestyle.

The Limited Labs team is...

Joey Savage — Joey is award-winning dietary supplement formulator with over a decade's worth of experience. Joey is the mad scientist at Limited Labs and his vision drives us to create amazing things like Ketone.io.

 

Sam Johnston — Sam is a product designer who has worked in nutrition, tech, and finance. He wears many hats in our organization, but his main contributions are his marketing and design skills. Sam drives the image of Limited Labs.

 

Earl — Earl is our fearless leader. His work ethic is simply pawesome.

 

Timeline

We will have Ketone.io ready just in time for your new year's resolution. So go ahead and pack on some pounds this holiday season if you want. We got you covered.

 

Research

Nutritional ketosis alters fuel preference and thereby endurance performance in athletes

Oral beta-hydroxybutyrate supplementation

Effects of beta-hydroxybutyrate on cognition in memory-impaired adults

Neuroprotective and disease-modifying effects of the ketogenic diet

Long-term effects of a ketogenic diet in obese patients

Ketone Bodies and Exercise Performance: The Next Magic Bullet or Merely Hype?

Endurance athletes prepare better for races with a low-carb diet

Cerebral metabolic adaptation and ketone metabolism after brain injury

Novel ketone diet enhances physical and cognitive performance

 

Ketones in the News

Special Energy Drink May Alter Metabolism and Boost Performance

My Experience with Exogenous Ketones

Breakthrough New Ketone Supplement

What Are Ketones? Scientists Find 'Food Group' For Better Cognition, Physical Fitness

 

Media Kit

Members of the media are encouraged to download our Media Kit for imagery and additional info.

 

FAQ

Who should drink Ketone.io?

Ketone.io is great for driven athletes (especially endurance athletes), gym rats, or even the office warrior for enhanced cognition.

Who should NOT drink Ketone.io?

Do not consume Ketone.io if you are pregnant or nursing. If you are currently suffering from any medical conditions, please consult with your healthcare provider before supplementing with Ketone.io.

What is a serving size of Ketone.io?

1 bottle (475ml/16.06 fl. oz.)

Is Ketone.io vegan? Dairy-free? GMO-free? Gluten-free?

Yes to all. Ketone.io is vegan, dairy-free, GMO-free, and gluten-free.

Is ketosis the same as ketoacidosis? 

Ketosis is NOT ketoacidosis, which is a serious diabetes complication. Ketosis, however, is a perfectly safe state of being. 

***If you have additional questions, please call or text 1.844.4KETONE1

 

Disclaimers

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Warning: if you have a medical condition, are pregnant, lactating, trying to conceive, or taking medications, consult your health care practitioner before using this product. Keep out of the reach of children.

goBHB® is a registered trademark under exclusive global distribution by Compound Solutions, Inc.

Ketone.io® is a registered trademark under exclusive global distribution by Limited Labs, LLC.

 

A Special Thanks to...

Compound Solutions — for creating their incredible ingredient goBHB Ketones

Fortitude Fitness — for allowing us to film at their gym 

April Steinmetz — for being such a talented athlete and model

Rival Labs — for being such an awesome manufacturer and friend

Kelsey Olanoff — for your marketing brilliance

Juliette Sutherland — for being such a great videographer

Instead, you will see a break-down of our entire formula, and we will always do our best to educate our supporters on the ingredients we chose for Ketone.io. Premium ketones in Ketone.io — We have partnered with Compound Solutions, the makers of goBHB™ Ketones, to ensure that Ketone.io is formulated with the most cutting-edge ingredients available today. A Trim Product — Our minimalistic formula is sugar-free (zero net carbs), fat-free, and it contains less than 50 calories.  Natural Ingredients — We are proud to present Ketone.io as a sports drink that contains NO artificial sweeteners, NO artificial flavors, and it's GMO-free.  3 Refreshing Flavors — Our first batch of Ketone.io will be produced in three great-tasting citrus flavors.Plus, those who back Ketone.io at the Ketone.io Champion level ($5,000 pledge) will get to create their own flavors!  Our StoryWe started Limited Labs in 2015 to create nutritional products that elevate the human experience. We wanted to maximize our customers' performance in all the things they do. We've had a number of successful nutritional products, but Ketone.io will take us to the next level in performance lifestyle.The Limited Labs team is...Joey Savage — Joey is award-winning dietary supplement formulator with over a decade's worth of experience. Joey is the mad scientist at Limited Labs and his vision drives us to create amazing things like Ketone.io. Sam Johnston — Sam is a product designer who has worked in nutrition, tech, and finance. He wears many hats in our organization, but his main contributions are his marketing and design skills. Sam drives the image of Limited Labs. Earl — Earl is our fearless leader. His work ethic is simply pawesome. TimelineWe will have Ketone.io ready just in time for your new year's resolution. So go ahead and pack on some pounds this holiday season if you want. We got you covered. ResearchNutritional ketosis alters fuel preference and thereby endurance performance in athletesOral beta-hydroxybutyrate supplementationEffects of beta-hydroxybutyrate on cognition in memory-impaired adultsNeuroprotective and disease-modifying effects of the ketogenic dietLong-term effects of a ketogenic diet in obese patientsKetone Bodies and Exercise Performance: The Next Magic Bullet or Merely Hype?Endurance athletes prepare better for races with a low-carb dietCerebral metabolic adaptation and ketone metabolism after brain injuryNovel ketone diet enhances physical and cognitive performance Ketones in the NewsSpecial Energy Drink May Alter Metabolism and Boost PerformanceMy Experience with Exogenous KetonesBreakthrough New Ketone SupplementWhat Are Ketones? Scientists Find 'Food Group' For Better Cognition, Physical Fitness Media KitMembers of the media are encouraged to download our Media Kit for imagery and additional info. FAQWho should drink Ketone.io?Ketone.io is great for driven athletes (especially endurance athletes), gym rats, or even the office warrior for enhanced cognition.Who should NOT drink Ketone.io?Do not consume Ketone.io if you are pregnant or nursing. If you are currently suffering from any medical conditions, please consult with your healthcare provider before supplementing with Ketone.io.What is a serving size of Ketone.io?1 bottle (475ml/16.06 fl. oz.)Is Ketone.io vegan? Dairy-free? GMO-free? Gluten-free?Yes to all. Ketone.io is vegan, dairy-free, GMO-free, and gluten-free.Is ketosis the same as ketoacidosis? Ketosis is NOT ketoacidosis, which is a serious diabetes complication. Ketosis, however, is a perfectly safe state of being. ***If you have additional questions, please call or text 1.844.4KETONE1 DisclaimersThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.Warning: if you have a medical condition, are pregnant, lactating, trying to conceive, or taking medications, consult your health care practitioner before using this product. Keep out of the reach of children.goBHB® is a registered trademark under exclusive global distribution by Compound Solutions, Inc.Ketone.io® is a registered trademark under exclusive global distribution by Limited Labs, LLC. A Special Thanks to...Compound Solutions — for creating their incredible ingredient goBHB KetonesFortitude Fitness — for allowing us to film at their gym April Steinmetz — for being such a talented athlete and modelRival Labs — for being such an awesome manufacturer and friendKelsey Olanoff — for your marketing brillianceJuliette Sutherland — for being such a great videographer

story:
Curated by food and wine columnist Jennifer Schell, 'The Butcher, The Baker, The Wine & Cheese Maker - An Okanagan Cookbook' celebrates the Okanagan's food culture and cuisine is set to hit bookshelves Fall 2012. 

Described by Schell as a "love letter to all who have created, grown and nutured our special 'place' on this earth" and where the reader can discover the relationships between the land, the food, the people and ultimately the recipes and tastes which reach the table.

Each recipe is also a story that leads the reader through a blend of history and biography of the people who put the food on your plate and the cherfs who create these delicious recipes.  With more than 90 contributions from the Okanagan's best chefs, winemakers and food producers, this book brings together the remarkable traditions and innovations of the Okanagan Valley that is quickly establishing itself as a culinary destination.

Your Contribution

Funds raised will primarily be used to offset printing costs and marketing 'The Butcher, The Baker, The Wine & Cheese Maker - An Okanagan Cookbook' throughout the valley and across the country.  This is not your traditional cookbook as we are celebrating not only the chefs and their delicous locally based recipes but we are also celebrating the work of the local farmer, and producer of the ingredients featured in the recipe.  Of course, being in wine country, each recipe is paired with a delicious Okanagan Valley wine.  
 
This cookbook is an ambitious project with over 90 contributors, more than 150 full colour photographs and 192 pages of the Okanagan culinary story.  This cookbook is also a story of the community of food and friends and with this funding opportunity we are engaging our community of friends - new and old - to participate in the making of this final product.  
 
A portion of the proceeds will go to the establishment of a community garden project with the Okanagan Chefs Association.
 
Please note all contributions will be processed in US funds as Indygogo works on an international financial platform. 

Share! 

Your contribution, big or small is greatly appreciated.  We would also encourage you to share this link with your friends and family who you feel would be interesting in helping this project make the impact on the culinary community that we know it can.  

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
0 Calories

 

 

The Problem

 

 

Seasonal Changes Can Take a Toll

 

There are many issues with the current solutions:

  • Shots require a needle to your arm
  • Sprays and drops can be unpleasant
  • Taking pills are challenging for children and even some adults

  • Many of the over the counter products are synthetic with potential side effects

 

It's Personal

 

 

Our founder, lives a balanced, active, and healthy lifestyle. Aero® started off as a necessity for our founder. After suffering from allergies year-round for over a decade it was time to act. A drink mix came to mind as that's what we know best, but how do we make it taste good? Our experience with develop proprietary flavoring systems fit like a glove and we created a great-tasting formula everyone can enjoy.

 

 

Why Powder?

  • Optimal delivery*
  • Ease of digestion*
  • Stability and potency*
  • Quick absorption for fast-acting results*

 

 

Benefits with purpose:

  • Support healthy respiratory and immune systems*
  • Promote clear airways and normal breathing*
  • Stabilize mast cells, which promote respiratory health*
  • Provide antioxidant support to neutralize free radicals*

 

 

Our Solution

 

We are on a mission to deliver a natural, simple, and effective solution without synthetic ingredients. We understand the needs of those that suffer from seasonal or year-round indoor and outdoor respiratory irritants and developed a product that you can use everyday.

Easy to use mix powder with 8 ounces of water or liquid of choice, shake or stir, drink and enjoy the comfort and live your life! 

 

 

Aero® was designed to be versatile with many applications:

  • Indoor and outdoor respiratory irritants*
  • Pet respiratory irritants*
  • Everyday immune support*
  • Stay ahead of seasonal changes*
  • Clear airways and normal breathing for your active lifestyle or sports*

 

 

Aero® can be used by all age groups, diabetics, yogis, athletes, children, elderly, vegans, and everyone in between we got you covered. 

 

Active Ingredients

 

 

 

The key active ingredients in Aero®:

  • Aller-7®
  • Vitamin C

Aller-7® Website: http://www.interhealthusa.com/our-brands/aller-7 

Aller-7® Clinical Studies: https://www.researchgate.net

 

 

Proven Experience

 

 

The Aero® team brings proven experience with over 6 years of product development specific to the functional supplements industry validated by our success with our sister brand Honey Badger. We developed a unique and proprietary natural flavoring system that tastes great without the unnecessary additives. 

 

Established Distribution 

 

Our track record speaks for itself:

  • Ecommerce and fulfillment expertise
  • Approved nationwide distribution with KeHE
  • Secured mass market retail channels such as Amazon.com, eBay.com, and H-E-B

 

 

Our nationwide distribution can reach potential retail locations near you: 

  • Pharmacies such as CVS, Walgreens, and Randalls
  • Mass Market Retailers such as Walmart, Target, and Costco
  • Grocery Retailers such as H-E-B, Sprouts, Kroger, Albertson's, and Whole Foods

 

Best Prices We'll Ever Offer

 

We're seeking your feedback and support in expediting the launch of Aero®:

  • Free shipping for all US shipments over $25
  • International orders will have additional shipping charges
  • All funds that we raise are going towards our first production
  • Front of the line access to our best pricing we're ever going to offer! 

 

Timeline

 

  1. Indiegogo Campaign - 1/8/18 - 2/8/18
  2. Production Started - 2/8/18
  3. Production Completed - 3/8/18
  4. Shipments Started Just In Time For Spring Allergy Season - 3/12/18

 

Your Impact

 

 

Aero® addresses many of the problems with the current products in the marketplace: 

  • One solution for all age groups
  • Great for your health, but also the earth
  • Refreshing drink at your convenience or on the go
  • Sustainable, eco-friendly, natural and clean plant-based ingredients
  • Your contribution will help bring this amazing product to market, thank you!

 

Top Notch Manufacturing

 

Our experience in the functional supplement industry has provided us many of the insights into running a successful company and establishing a brand that you can trust. 

 

 

Our entire production process from product development to manufacturing is top notch:

  • FDA approved and GMP certified facilities
  • Third party testing on all ingredients to verify purity
  • Every batch is carefully constructed to ensure quality control, consistency, and efficacy

 

Challenges Ahead

 

We learned a lot over the years on the do's and don'ts with functional supplements. This gives us the best opportunity to execute proven strategies to create a long-lasting, stable brand.

 

 

We have plans to release additional products in the near future. We will offer Aero® in a 30 serving jar designed for everyday usage. Stay tuned for updates as we navigate the early stages of Aero®.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Aero® started off as a personal remedy for our founder and now we're ready to share it with the world!

 

 

Please help get the word:

  • Share this great solution to a problem that many people suffer from daily
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and help spread the word and set your breathing free!

 

FAQ

 

How do I make a purchase?

Pick a perk to support and take advantage of our best pricing ever!

 

Why do I have to pay more for international shipping?

Shipping costs outside of the USA are significantly higher, so we can't offer free shipping and have to add it individually by country.

 

 

Are shipping taxes included in your purchase?

No. For international backers, your government may tax you on the product as it enters your country, and we do not cover these for you.  Each country has slightly different rules on duties/taxes, so please do check those and make sure you factor them in when you choose to back our campaign!

 

What about my shipping address?

We’ll reach out to get your shipping information as we get closer to delivery date!

 

 

Where is the product created?

Aero® is made in Texas, USA.

 

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

story:
The Story of Crust To Dust Pizza LLC.


Who We Are - Our names are Ryan Orzechowski & Emily Wink, we are the founders and owners of Crust To Dust Pizza LLC! We want to give back to the Vegan Community and we believe this is the best way to do so. We've felt nothing but love and support and we want to pay that forward. 

I (Ryan) had the pleasure of creating Vegan Pizzas at Wegmans for my fellow Vegans. Now that my time has come to an end at Wegmans, it only made sense to start our very own pizzeria. During this time, we have been perfecting our recipes at home. Also, during the month of February, I will be enrolled in the Worlds FIRST Vegan Pizza school, which will allow us to bring worldly varieties and flavors to our menu! 

I (Emily) am grateful for all of the positive life changes that have happened for me since adopting a plant-based diet. I have always felt a true passion for making people happy through their stomachs! In my spare time I am constantly working on new creative recipes to serve at our pizzeria and even concurring gluten sensitive options.  My background, though not in food service, is strong in marketing and advertising. My career is rich in music entertainment and radio.  This has inspired us to theme our creations after vegan-musicians who spread the word of a more compassionate world. Won't you come try a slice of the "Wu Wisdom" or "Thirty Seconds to Parm?"

We cannot wait to bring you the Vegan Pizza you deserve!

Why This Campaign Is Important to Us - This campaign will allow us to further the process of getting the pizzeria up and running! We have both been Vegan for a year and we feel completely at home within the Vegan Community. Creating pizzas for our fellow Vegans brings us a tremendous amount of joy. We will be looking to collaborate with other Plant Based entrepreneurs in WNY, as well as Non-For Profits. Everyone has an emotional attachment to pizza. When you adopt a plant based life-style, that desire for pizza as a comfort food does't go away. We want to provide the community pizzas that they'll fall in love with. 

Pizza for Earthlings, not made of Earthlings.
We're so grateful for your support, it truly means the world.
Without YOU, there is no US​. 
 

What We Need & What You Get!

The Funding of this Campaign will go directly to the business!  We will use the funds in many different ways, such as start up costs, securing a location and ordering equipment & supplies! Contributions  from this project will allow us to purchase equipment and help with expenses associated with opening a new business. 

We have some awesome perks available! Ranging from your first pizza, a special customized CTD baseball tee and your very own Pizza creation that we'll serve in our store for all to enjoy!

If we don't reach our goal, the money we do have will be used entirely for start up costs!​

Your Impact!

  • Your contribution means the world to us as it allows us the ability to get the pizzeria going even quicker! We will use the funds in many different ways, such as start up costs, securing a location and ordering equipment & supplies! 


Risks & Challenges

  • Opening a business from scratch comes with obstacles, however, we are confident we can overcome anything that comes our way. Our biggest obstacle will be obtaining the start up funds to allow us to obtain a business loan. Your contributions will allow us to get one step closer to obtaining the crucial business loan we need! 


Other Ways You Can Help

Word of mouth is a powerful tool, as is social media!
We'd greatly appreciate if you could share this campaign link, as well as go like our social media pages!

Facebook -  www.facebook.com/crusttodust 
Twitter - www.twitter.com/crusttodust
Instagram - www.instagram.com/crusttodust

Thank you for your support, it means the world to us.
- Ryan & Emily
Crust To Dust Pizza LLC
