story:
MakerBars Mission

MakerBars was founded by believing healthy energy bars should be affordable & tasty for customers. Our founder has always been passionate that more people need to be engaged in cooking and after tirelessly making granola bars, he stumbled upon the idea to package the ingredients in a kit. Visit www.makerbars.com to learn more!

Simple Ingredients including fair trade, local to Canada, organic, and a dash of love. 

Zeroing Waste by not having any food wrappers which are Canadas top plastic polluter (Greenpeace).

Product Features

Instructions: Minutes to make (no bake). Mix, press, & shape!! Each of the kits are very simple and you can customize the size. You can even mix it up and add your own protein or superfoods.

Here's how you can save by making MakerBars

 

Perks Explained

Introducing: The Variety Pack!

Includes:

1x The Original - The OG (Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip) [Reg MSRP $12 (CAD)]

1x The Date Cashew Coconut [Reg MSRP $16 (CAD)]

1x The Crunchy Chocolate Cherry [Reg MSRP $16 (CAD)]

Two Options for 3 Packs of MakerBars

There are two type of 3 packs of kits available in the perks for backing this campaign. Early backers will be able to earn free shipping! Each kit makes approximately 10-12 energy bars or 20-24 energy balls. 

  1. The OG (original) 3 pack - more than 400 customers already love it! 
  2. The Variety Pack - be a part of something new!

The MakerBars Fair Trade Shirt

We are currently developing the T-shirt with our designers. It will be sourced from our Canadian partners. The design will have the MakerBars logo on the left side of the chest (front) and our manifesto on the back. We're confident the design is going to be amazing!

 

Further Information About MakerBars

Nutrition Table Overview

Testimonials

Team

Josh has been a passionate foodie his entire life since he was a child cooking in the kitchen. He is pursuing a dual degree in Integrated Engineering & HBA which has allowed him to apply his schooling to create his business. MakerBars was inspired by this passion and aims to share the love for cooking with the world.

Sam is our mascot! He's the glue of the team. 

 

The Impact

Our goal is to raise $2,000 (CAD) from this campaign. That being said, we have stretch goals with some unique discounts and extra perks. Check out below:

 

 

\\

 

Shipping

Shipping for the kits are in Canada only. There are other ways to contribute if you'd like to be first to receive discounts to our future shipping locations! The Tips Jar and Personalized Card ships anywhere in the world!

Regular Shipping is $8.99 on our website. 

Discounted Shipping is $6 for the Indiegogo Special & is already included. 

 

Timeline

Special Thanks

We care about local ingredients, and that extends to all areas of our business. Help us fund Canadian-made, carbon neutral boxes from Georgette Packaging.

Social

 

                          Follow on Instagram          Like on Facebook

 

Other Ways To Contribute

Share With Friends

  • We can't tell you how much this means to us! Share the campaign on Facebook or Instagram. You can also copy the link and send to your team at work! 

USA & Other Countries

  • The Tips Jar and Personalized Card ships anywhere in the world! If you vibe with our mission, we would love to keep you in touch. We hope to ship to other countries as we grow and you will be the first to know!

Risks & Challenges

All new products have inherent risks involved. Although MakerBars look simple, it requires precise measuring and mixing techniques. We are focused on quality and providing a great experience. 

At MakerBars, our customers are our top priority. We will complete orders regardless of whether we reach our goal given the flexible goal. We are confident in our ability to manufacture and distribute our energy bar kits to every backer!

story:
The Blackbeard Armada Cookware set is based upon this summer’s biggest food success on Kickstarter: the Blackbeard frying pan. We never imagined our initial goal of €50.000 would turn into €332.437 so fast: more than 3,400 backers from across the seven seas helped us bring the Blackbeard to life.

That was just the beginning: after the end of our campaign, we launched the Blackbeard frying pan on Indiegogo for those who missed out on our Kickstarter campaign. On 1 November more than 273 backers pledged over €28.000.

Ultimately, more than 800 backers provided us with feedback: they wanted more! In the spirit of the holidays, we created the Blackbeard Armada: a tribute to our backers and to the success of the Blackbeard. Again, our campaign became a great success: more than 2.000 backers pledged over €315.000. Amazing!

Yet again, we receive many requests from our crowd: people are still eager to order items of our Blackbeard Armada set. Therefore, we launched our campaign on Indiegogo InDemand. You can preorder your cookware items, but don’t hesitate for too long. Our campaign is only running for a limited time.

 

Patron-cuisinier chef Johan van Groeninge - Restaurant: Avant-Garde van Groeninge * (One Michelin star) 

 

Food connects, especially when it’s shared with others. Surprise a loved one and give away one of our Blackbeard Armada items as a ‘future gift’. We’ve recorded a short video in which you can see me – Tacco – and the one who taught me everything about cooking – my mother.

Pre-order one of our fleet essentials and share this video: amaze someone else!

We believe the cookware industry needs pirates. That’s how we originally came up with our first hack: the Blackbeard. A unique collaboration between our crowd, Michelin star chefs and manufacturers working for the world’s best-known brands. 

High-quality pans usually do not come cheap. A lot of the price is taken up by marketing activities, distribution networks, and local agencies, which mainly focus on brand positioning and do not necessarily reflect the quality of the pan. We are working together with our crowd to create another smuggling route that evades the big brands. 

The Blackbeard Armada will be manufactured by the same producers as the famous brands we all know. But instead of paying for the big-brand frills, we are only paying for chef-grade manufacturing. This makes the complete Armada fleet available for a fair price. All resources go into the quality of our products: that’s why we haven’t recruited native speaking actors for our crowdfunding video :).

The days of sticking food and organizing cookware in the kitchen are over. The Blackbeard Armada is carefully assembled, consisting of chef-grade frying pans, saucepans, deep casseroles and a lid for the Blackbeard frying pan. A complete fleet of stackable cookware; with an eye for design and easily stored due to the compact design. While being optimized for ease of use for cooks of all levels: whether you’re an ambitious home cook or a Michelin star chef.

Thanks to the stainless steel honeycomb pattern that protrudes above the non-stick coating, the Armada pans are scratch-resistant and extremely suitable for intensive use. Forget regular non-stick layers that start to wear out after 1 to 2 years of use – or even faster, and where the coating layer ends up in your food. The honeycomb pattern extends the lifespan of the current non-stick layers to at least 5 years.

Our quality isn't just premium: our frying pans, saucepans, deep casseroles and lid can measure up to quality demands of top chefs. The three-layer construction forms the canvas for the honeycomb pattern that is etched into it. The dimples are then filled with a PTFE Whitford non-stick coating that is PFOA-free. We have thoroughly tested our coating and our pans have received a PASS for all tests with excellent test results.

We have designed the pans with a 2.6 mm thick surface, which consists of three layers: a stainless steel bottom layer, an aluminum layer and another mirror polished stainless steel layer as a finish. This technique makes the pans suitable for all heat sources and very energy-efficient.

The Blackbeard is not like any other non-stick pan. Before cooking like a real pirate, here’s how to use our wild & rugged mate:

  • Slowly heat up the pan over low heat. The aluminum core is a great heat conductor and gets hot very fast.
  • Use enough oil.

When you hold the Blackbeard - a member of the Armada - for the first time, you can feel and see the quality we had in mind. That’s exactly what we wanted you to experience again when holding the different cookware essentials of our Blackbeard Armada. The pans are not too light, but certainly not too heavy. The mirror polishing of our pans provides a glorious and ultimate cooking experience. Smile

Early on in our first campaign, many pirates asked us about a lid for the Blackbeard frying pans. It’s upon their request that we’ve come up with a lid to control heat easily and preserve flavor, while reducing oil splatter at the same time: the Tricorne. A compact and modern mirror polished stainless steel lid that matches the design of the Blackbeard ø28 cm/11” frying pan and wok perfectly and can be stored and cleaned easily. The lid also has a steam vent to let steam escape, so the lid doesn’t bang around.

Serve your meals in style with the Tricorne: use the lid like a cloche to cover your dish, causing surprise and expectation among your guests.

Top chefs know better than anyone what it takes to create the perfect pan. That’s why we took their advice on board and designed several handles for our Blackbeard Armada. 

The handles of the Blackbeard frying pans, Queen Anne’s saucepans and Concord casseroles are made of solid cast stainless steel. The handles of the frying pans are riveted onto the pans and we’ve decided to use the same handles - adjusted in size - for the saucepans. After extensive testing, we made a choice to use welded handles for both the lid and the deep casseroles. Instead of one handle, our deep casseroles have two small handles that perfectly fit the minimalistic design and make the casseroles easy to store.

Whether you’re pan-frying a thick steak, preparing a traditional beef stew or making a delicious gravy: you can prepare the dish of your choice for every occasion and create a chef-grade meal with the Blackbeard Armada cookware.

The road to perfection took a long time during which we carefully looked at the design process, so that craftsmanship, design and love for cooking merge seamlessly. Piece by piece we put together our fleet, using the successful techniques of the original Blackbeard. For our first campaign, we tested the prototypes of the Blackbeard extensively within our community until we had the pan that fits perfectly with what our crew of pirates wants. 

We rigorously tested prototypes of the Blackbeard with a very wide range of foodies. Among other things, we discovered that stainless steel thickness less than 2mm is suboptimal, but when it’s more than 3mm, the frying pan becomes too heavy for convenient handling. We found the perfect thickness to be 2.6mm. 

We tested a huge range of handles, because the importance of the handle can’t be underestimated: it provides control and is closely linked to the pleasure of cooking. We also extensively tested how far the Blackbeard honeycomb coating should reach for maximum effect, leaving an area near the rim untouched. Last but not least: we bent the edge of the Blackbeard, but we finally put it upright. This allows you to pour without worrying about spillage. Both the saucepans and deep casseroles are designed using the successful techniques of the original Blackbeard frying pans, including a 2.6mm three-layer construction, honeycomb pattern and mirror polish.

As middlemen of the global cookware industry, we got to know the manufacturers who produce for renowned brands, allowing us to get to know the ins and outs of this industry. 

We wanted to turn the tide by working from the inside, so we signed a partnership with a top-notch manufacturer. A rebellious ‘pan-whisperer’ who, like no other, is acquainted with all techniques and knows everything about creating the best pans, and has been doing so for many years for the world’s best-known brands. As the youngest member of a pans bakers’ guild, he wanted to break through the monopoly that generations before had adhered to.

Looking back at our previous campaign, together we can literally do anything. Especially since more cookware manufacturers want to join us. Rather than having a rack filled with scratched, un-coated and excessive kitchen utensils, owning a few will give you the flexibility and the performance to cook whatever you want - even improving your cooking skills

Are you ready for a life of adventures and never-ending fun? The call of the sea is in the heart of every pirate who ever swashed a buckle. Become part of our community by kick-starting our Blackbeard Armada. Join us and pre-order unique kitchen utensils to complete your own fleet.
story_txt:
The Blackbeard Armada Cookware set is based upon this summer’s biggest food success on Kickstarter: the Blackbeard frying pan. We never imagined our initial goal of €50.000 would turn into €332.437 so fast: more than 3,400 backers from across the seven seas helped us bring the Blackbeard to life.That was just the beginning: after the end of our campaign, we launched the Blackbeard frying pan on Indiegogo for those who missed out on our Kickstarter campaign. On 1 November more than 273 backers pledged over €28.000.Ultimately, more than 800 backers provided us with feedback: they wanted more! In the spirit of the holidays, we created the Blackbeard Armada: a tribute to our backers and to the success of the Blackbeard. Again, our campaign became a great success: more than 2.000 backers pledged over €315.000. Amazing!Yet again, we receive many requests from our crowd: people are still eager to order items of our Blackbeard Armada set. Therefore, we launched our campaign on Indiegogo InDemand. You can preorder your cookware items, but don’t hesitate for too long. Our campaign is only running for a limited time. 
Crowd Cookware is based upon a community of thousands of food lovers. Together we develop, design and create new chef-grade products that otherwise would only be available to the famous brands we all know.
Our first treasure – the original Blackbeard frying pan – has been delivered in December 2018 and January 2019, and many backers were thrilled. We received some great feedback. Prior to the moment our backers received their Blackbeards, we surprised some of them last autumn. We delivered the first Blackbeards in person as a way to say “thanks” to our crowd. Check out the great response and find out how the Blackbeard arrived at Kickstarter’s HQ.
Below you can read a few comments backers left behind on our page.

Patron-cuisinier chef Johan van Groeninge - Restaurant: Avant-Garde van Groeninge * (One Michelin star) 
 
 Food connects, especially when it’s shared with others. Surprise a loved one and give away one of our Blackbeard Armada items as a ‘future gift’. story:
Our goal is to gift cold frosty treats, to hot dusty burners, often when they least expect it.

We are a group of veteran and virgin burners from California and beyond. (Video being uploaded)

It all started with a dream last year to bring liquid nitrogen (LN2) to the desert to gift ice cream for the citizens of Black Rock City.

Getting giant cryogenic tanks to Burning Man is no easy task, making ice cream with the nitrogen by hand is also not easy in the desert. Alas, we were unable to make it happen last year. We did provide tea and naan bread to many happy people from an air conditioned dome at Camp Noonaantea.

We spent the year researching and planning and finally have the equipment and experience to make it a reality! We are bringing 260 liters of nitrogen and a variety of bases like coconut milk, fresh fruit juices, and alcohol (21+ only!)

If you are able to donate it will help cover the cost of the nitrogen, ingredients, and trailer needed to get the tanks up to BRC.

There will be different flavors each day! Breakfast Cereal Ice Cream with milk, Coffee with chocolate covered espresso beans, cookie butter and smores, cheesecake ice cream, frozen mojitos, margaritas, Coladas, Jager and Red Bull, and many other crazy combinations.

Making ice cream with liquid nitrogen produces a smoother creamier texture than regular ice cream because the ice crystals that form are almost non existent.

Even without any funding, we'll be on the playa making treats for the camps in our neighborhood. When we do reach our goal, we'll post the location in the guide so more people know we exist and can experience our delicious treats for themselves!

What We Need

We need tanks:

Already purchased a tank and our nitrogen supplier has generously donated a 50 and 160 liter tank! We just need to pay for the nitrogen.

We need a trailer:

The rented cargo trailer will allow us to secure the tanks and transport everything to BRC and back safely!!

We need ingredients:

We will be making non-dairy ice cream so we don't have to worry about spoilage and keeping a large amount of the base cold. Fruit juice, coconut milk, and booze have all come out amazing at our early tasting parties.

What You Get

We'll be gifting our flavors of the day to the citizens of Black Rock City Wednesday - Saturday. Citizens only need to bring their own cup/bowl/container and their spoons. We will also put it on a cookie, pie, or slice of cheese if you bring it.

If you aren't going to Burning Man, but would like to donate please do! We will be grateful for your support and will make sure you get some ice cream when we get back if you're local. Long distance supporters of $50 will get ice cream shipped to them when we return!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this with anyone you know that is going to Black Rock City and would be interested in a frosty treat on a hot day.

story:
Our Story:

Last year we set out to build a small coffee bar with some really BIG dreams. We wanted a place that would feel like a holiday, a place for rich specialty coffee, decadent savory pastries and tasty treats, but most of all, a place for our local Burbank community to gather...  

Along our journey of building, our contractor turned unwell and was increasingly unable to work. Quickly 3 months of building turned into almost a year. There were too many days going by and we were getting nervous that we may not be able to stretch our loan long enough to get our doors open. We thought long and hard about our options and decided to "wall off" the front section of our coffee bar in order to make opeing quick. Space & seating would have to come later. 

(Below is a photo of "The Palm" in early stages of the build.... Whoa! It's come a long way!)

The goal was always to apply for seating permits and build a small intimate seating area for our customers to stay, relax and enjoy a good cup of coffee with a friend or sit with a journal in the quiet moments before a busy work day. 

The Feedback:

After being open for almost 7 months we have had a wonderful ride and you have shown us so much support along the way!

But the feedback we get daily is:

  • You want to sit down.
  • You want to stay! 

And... we want to give you your moment alone with your coffee. (Like the kind you dream of before you fall asleep at night). We would like to take your feedback and our vision of gathering community to its fruition.

To do this we need your help. 

In order for us to start this project we need a few things. These things come in time and cost which is why we are asking you, our friends, family & our coffee family to help us make this happen. ​

What we need + What you get:

Your donations will go towards:

  • Encroachment Permitting / Permitting outdoor seating - $1,000
  • Indoor / Seating Permitting- $2,000
  • Drywall, Building Materials, Seating build out- $5,000
  • Indiegogo Fees 5% plus 3% on credit cards $320

PRE: TOTAL :  $8,320

- $4000 *We are putting $4000 into this project because we believe it to be what the community wants. You can help us prove it by donating and grabbing some of our cool perks today!

Total we need to raise: $4,320

Stretch Goal- (If we exceed our goal)

If we exceed our goal, our plan is to use the extra money to make the space beautiful and fun for you guys! I would love to have Jackie Robbins Leather down the street make us some leather seating cushions, I have some ideas for selfie spots, a kids corner  and with some extra cash I can make the place super chic and fun! 

The Impact:

Your contribution will:

  • Promote the gathering of our local community. 
  • Invest in the Magnolia Park Community by supporting a small local business.
  • Allow us to introduce a food program to serve our local community. 
  • Create a space to increase your comfort while waiting for your favorite drink.

Risks & Challenges:

There is a chance that our indoor or outdoor permit could get denied by the city findings after we apply. Getting permitting can be challenging. We simply do not have enough parking spaces to guarantee that seating is attained, but we think we have an upper hand since Ben's background was in permit expediting!

If all permitting attempts fail our plan is to move the wall back, open up the space and add a long standing bar to the right hand side of the shop, so you can step aside and enjoy your coffee in your own spacious, glorious, personal space. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Sometimes we can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Sharing is caring! Just use the Indiegogo share tools located below.
  • Have a skill we may need? Can you hang drywall? Build out framing? Are you a woodworker with some free time? We will compensate you with gift cards for free stuff if you can lend a hand to the build out. Email us at info@thepalmcoffeebar.com for more info. 

Thank you for taking the time to check out our dream + indiegogo campaign!

We hope to seat you soon! 

~Joanna Heart Milliken,  Ben Milliken & Julien Milliken

story:
What We Want to Accomplish

 

At A Their Turn Company, we want to create a food experience that is welcoming to all people from all over. Say Cheese is a ministry based company that desires to show the love of God through creating a great sandwich and a life-giving, Jesus-centered culture. We want people from all over to be able to come to a place that they can purchase great food at a low cost and be able to also give back to their community, all while being accepted and encouraged.

 

How We Want to Accomplish This

 

Creating a great grilled cheese may seem easy but it takes practice and preparation. We use thin rye bread and toast both sides so that the bread is a little crunchy, we then use our secret chipotle sauce instead of mayonnaise. Finally, we top each sandwich off with our fresh and daily-prepared ingredients. Our Tomato Soup is also home made with real peeled tomatoes, onions, butter, and salt.

 

Besides a great meal, every person will also receive a “God Loves You” card. On one side of this card it says, “Just want you to know God Loves You” and on the other side it has Life giving words and a reference verse like “God has called you by name, you have a purpose.” (Exodus 9:16). Also with every 15th meal paid for we will keep a meal and on our ministry days we will give all of those saved meals away. We want to live out Romans 12:21- “Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.”  When someone comes to our food trucks they won’t experience religious fanatics that know how to cook, they will experience people who are in love with Jesus and who want them to experience the same kind of love. This kind of love isn’t expressed by words, but by actions. We want to be the example of what a “Kingdom Company” is, and that is a company that is in business of growing the kingdom of God

 

Our Goal and what do we need?

 

Our soft launch was a HUGE success, with over 100 customers in attendance. We were renting a food truck, but soon found out within the first 30 minutes that what we need was a truck specifically catered to our needs. We found out that our grilled cheeses we in a much higher demand than we expected. So, we need a few things:

 

Food Truck $15,000.00

Griddle with burners $4,000.00

Refrigerated sandwich prep table $1,500.00

Stand Up Fridge $1,800.00

3 compartment sink $1,000.00

Hand Washing Sink $200.00

Prep Tables $400.00

Exhaust hood $2,000.00

Generator $8,000.00

Extinguishing System $7,000

Other Ways You Can Help

If a monetary contribution isn't something you're financially able to do, we understand! However, there is still a way that you can help us significantly, and that's by sharing the word about us on social media, and more. You can find us here:

Facebook: facebook.com/saycheesegiveback

Instagram: @saycheesegiveback

Website: saycheesegiveback.com

What We Want to Accomplish At A Their Turn Company, we want to create a food experience that is welcoming to all people from all over. Say Cheese is a ministry based company that desires to show the love of God through creating a great sandwich and a life-giving, Jesus-centered culture. We want people from all over to be able to come to a place that they can purchase great food at a low cost and be able to also give back to their community, all while being accepted and encouraged.
 
How We Want to Accomplish This Creating a great grilled cheese may seem easy but it takes practice and preparation. We use thin rye bread and toast both sides so that the bread is a little crunchy, we then use our secret chipotle sauce instead of mayonnaise. Finally, we top each sandwich off with our fresh and daily-prepared ingredients. Our Tomato Soup is also home made with real peeled tomatoes, onions, butter, and salt. Besides a great meal, every person will also receive a “God Loves You” card. On one side of this card it says, “Just want you to know God Loves You” and on the other side it has Life giving words and a reference verse like “God has called you by name, you have a purpose.” (Exodus 9:16). Also with every 15th meal paid for we will keep a meal and on our ministry days we will give all of those saved meals away. We want to live out Romans 12:21- “Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.”  When someone comes to our food trucks they won’t experience religious fanatics that know how to cook, they will experience people who are in love with Jesus and who want them to experience the same kind of love. This kind of love isn’t expressed by words, but by actions. We want to be the example of what a “Kingdom Company” is, and that is a company that is in business of growing the kingdom of God
 
Our Goal and what do we need? Our soft launch was a HUGE success, with over 100 customers in attendance. We were renting a food truck, but soon found out within the first 30 minutes that what we need was a truck specifically catered to our needs. We found out that our grilled cheeses we in a much higher demand than we expected. So, we need a few things: Food Truck $15,000.00
Griddle with burners $4,000.00
Refrigerated sandwich prep table $1,500.00
Stand Up Fridge $1,800.00
3 compartment sink $1,000.00
Hand Washing Sink $200.00
Prep Tables $400.00
Exhaust hood $2,000.00
Generator $8,000.00
Extinguishing System $7,000

Other Ways You Can Help
If a monetary contribution isn't something you're financially able to do, we understand! However, there is still a way that you can help us significantly, and that's by sharing the word about us on social media, and more. You can find us here:
Facebook: facebook.com/saycheesegiveback
Instagram: @saycheesegiveback
Website: saycheesegiveback.com

story:
A New Black Woman-Owned Wine Bar on the Block

You might recognize Christina Lewis and Kai-Michelle Coleman from your adventures around Crown Heights and beyond.

These god-sisters and Brooklyn natives have been committed to providing unique wine suggestions and support for the past 5 years, and are now preparing to curate natural, organic and biodynamic wine experiences that open up palates and perceptions in the neighborhood with their intimate new bar, ä,perə’tif. 

What's an aperitif? A drink taken before a meal to stimulate the appetite.

Your contribution can help to transform an entrepreneurial dream into a reality. With a thorough understanding of how to elevate food and beverage options, ä,perə’tif is poised for tremendous success as both watering hole and community event space. We are working to finalize renovations that breathe new life into a former pawn shop and driving school, and to ensure our administrative staff has the resources to coordinate an opening worthy of our beloved slice of Brooklyn. Our inclusive space hopes to open our doors with many displays of gratitude at our Soft Launch Soirees; complimentary tickets will be made available to contributors of all levels to gather and toast to new opportunities. VIP Contributors further have access to preferred reservations and can select their unchanging seat of choice for the season.

"We look forward to opening our doors, while balancing realistic timelines and expectations. As Black women in the wine industry, we constantly face hesitations about our knowledge and abilities, and allow these interactions to fuel our desire to diversify the landscape for all people interested in deepening their knowledge of food and drink. Unlike many of our peers, we remain open and adaptable to provide experiences that exceed expectations." -Christina and Kai-Michelle

story:
The wait is over

Our new generation of WoodCraft™ spirits are bringing a progressive, craft mindset to the world of whiskey.

Craft your own personal spirit

We make our spirits in very small batches so it’s now possible for you, your friends and family to create your very own personal recipe – even if you only want 1 bottle!

At our Custom Spirit Experiences we will guide you through the art & science of making great spirits. Just like a professional whiskey maker you'll learn about how grain and wood combine to make amazing spirits. Using our six WoodCraft™ spirits you'll play around with crafting the perfect recipe for you. With your recipe safely stored, we'll then hand bottle and send you your personal bottle complete with your hand signed label. If you chose the experience perk we will be able to offer them in both Windsor and London.

The clever bit

We’ve spent years and carried out thousands of experiments to perfect our patented WoodCraft™ finishing technology to get the most flavour from the wood. Only using natural ingredients and processes, we can now craft super smooth spirits in hours - not the years it takes with traditional whiskies.

Our WoodCraft™ finishing technology also means we can release the natural flavour from lots of different woods. We’ve already made spirits from maple, cherry and hickory but now we need your help to do more. 

Research into new woods takes time and money. With your help we will be able to test more woods to create exciting new tastes. The £18,000 we are hoping to raise will pay for tests on 6-8 new woods. If we raise more, we can test more more woods.

We’ve already tracked down some unusual woods like Peppertree and woods with interesting stories like oak that blew down in the The Great Storm of 1987. Our dream is to create a range of British WoodCraft™ spirits using sustainable woods from all over the country. If you have a suggestion for a wood you would like to try then we’d love to hear from you. 

WoodCraft™ finishing is already working!

From our distillery in Cincinnati, we have just launched our Riverboat Collection: four WoodCraft™ spirits that take their inspiration from the boats that used to sail down the Ohio River in the 1800s carrying whiskey to New Orleans and beyond. Before Prohibition, Ohio was where 80% of American whiskies were made.

The Riverboat Collection are now available to buy in the UK either direct from us in Windsor or on our website. 

  • Old Dexter (40% abv) – the easy drinking one - a four-grain classic distillation that is Woodcraft finished using American Oak
  • Paddle Wheel (45% abv) – WoodCraft finished with 200 year old American Oak for a complex taste of yesteryear.
  • Tall Stacks (43% abv) - Woodcraft finished with ‘triple wood smoked’ woods for a natural smokiness, it’s like the warmth of a bonfire in a glass.
  • Deck Hand (48% abv) - a 5-wood rye WoodCraft finished using 3 oak woods, plus cherry and maple wood that is both complex and smooth.

The Founder's Club

As an eternal thank you for backing our project and making Brain Brew Whiskey come to life in the UK and beyond, every backer will be enrolled into 'The Founder's Club'.  As a member of The Founder's Club you'll be the first to hear about new releases and will enjoy some exclusive offers.

Our Rewards

Thank You Postcard - we know some people are too far away but still want to give a helping hand. You'll receive a hand signed postcard from our team to say thank you for helping make this a reality.

Founder's Club Membership - from this tier upwards you will be enrolled into the Founder's Club and receive the benefits mentioned above.

Signed Copy of Driving! Eureka - WoodCraft™ finishing was created by our founder, Doug Hall, best-selling Author and Inventor. In Doug’s new book, he shares his learning from a lifetime of innovation and tells the story of WoodCraft™ spirits. This is your very own signed copy.

Brain Brew Soft Cover Notebook - You'll receive a high quality softcover notebook for you to doodle, keep tasting notes, or simply use at work.

Brain Brew T-Shirt - we've partnered with the clothing company Hunts Point Co. to make some super cool, super comfortable and environmentally friendly t-shirts made from organic cotton.

Brain Brew Glass - our branded glasses are big enough for you to enjoy your WoodCraft™ Spirits neat, with ice, with water or in a cocktail.

Brain Brew Sweatshirt - for those colder days wrap up warm with our hard wearing Brain Brew sweatshirt made from organic cotton.

The experiences below will be carried out in 2020 - you'll be able to choose the dates once they're released. Every experience is valid for 12 months.

Custom Spirit Experience - we believe everyone deserves their own WoodCraft™ Spirit. Held in Windsor weekly or in  London every month, you will spend an enjoyable 2 hours with us crafting your unique personal recipe. Guided by our experts by the end of the experience, your recipe will be stored and we will hand bottle and send you a 70cl bottle finished off with a label signed by you.  Valid for 12 months.

Custom Cocktail Experience – you'll learn everything you need to so that you can make your own great tasting WoodCraft™ Spirit cocktails. You'll then start to fine tune so you can create a cocktail customised to your taste preferences. At the end you'll receive a 70cl bottle of the Riverboat WoodCraft™ Spirit of your choice to enable you to make your cocktails at home. We will hold these experiences weekly in Windsor and every month in London. Valid for 12 months.

Custom Spirit Experience & Overnight Stay for 2 – After enjoying your Custom Spirit Experience, you can relax with a meal for 2 and a night in the George hotel on Eton High Street. Valid for 12 months.

Private Spirit Experience for up to 8 people - as per the Custom Whiskey Experience but with your own private group. Your group will spend an enjoyable 2 hours with us crafting your unique personal recipe from a wide range of WoodCraft™ spirits. Guided by our experts by the end of the experience, each of the group will have their recipe stored. We will then hand bottle to that personal recipe and send each member of the group their 70cl bottle complete with their personal hand-signed label. This is the ideal reward for you and your friends or family. We will hold these experiences weekly in Windsor and every month in London. Valid for 12 months.

Private Cocktail Experience for up to 8 people - as per the Custom Cocktail Experience but with your own private group. When you come to Windsor you'll learn everything you need to so that you can make your own great tasting WoodCraft™ Spirit cocktails. Together you'll have lots of fun making WoodCraft™ Spirit cocktails and then each creating your own signature blend. At the end you'll each receive a 70cl bottle of the Riverboat WoodCraft™ Spirit of your choice to enable you to make your cocktails at home. We will hold these experiences weekly in Windsor and every month in London. Valid for 12 months.

Master Whiskey Maker Curation Evening - for those that want a little more help we'll speak with you in advance of the evening to discover what styles and flavours of food and drinks you enjoy. With this information we will curate a few WoodCraft™ Spirits for you in advance which you can then fine tune on the evening. You can back this reward and redeem it both sides of the Atlantic. Bring up to 3 friends with you and we'll ship you a case of 6x70cl bottles of your final recipe. You can back this reward and redeem it in Windsor, UK, or Cincinnati, Ohio USA. Valid for 12 months.

Eureka! Inventing: Brand Creation Day - if you you want to build your own brand of spirit then this is the reward for you. Along with up to 7 colleagues you will join us for a day where we show you how to build a brand using the principles we teach at the Eureka! Ranch. In the morning you will work with our experts on the building blocks of your brand. In the afternoon you will work to create a great drink to match. By the end of the day you'll have a brand concept and product that you can take to the next stage. You can back this reward and redeem it in Windsor, UK, or Cincinnati, Ohio USA. Valid for 12 months.

Custom Wood Spirit Development - this is the ultimate reward - the unique opportunity to create a truly custom spirit using wood that is local or special to you. It could be a family table, piano, cricket bat or wherever your imagination takes you. Using our WoodCraft™ finishing we will develop recipes using your wood to create your perfect product. Please note that this reward is subject to you providing a suitable wood that will pass through our rigorous quality and safety checks. If you can't find a suitable wood we will help you source another unique wood. Valid for 12 months.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Fern Lashley. I am one of the caretakers (together with Lucille Lambert) of a tropical fruit farm located at Claremont, in the southwestern area of Antigua, West Indies. I have decided to launch this crowdfunding campaign in order to raise funds for fences to protect this tropical fruit farm against the plague of PRAEDIAL LARCENY.

WHAT ON EARTH IS PRAEDIAL LARCENY?

Praedial larceny is an act of theft. It is when a person steals fruit, vegetables, livestock or even farm equipment from a farm. This is frustrating to say the least for farmers and farm owners.

Praedial Larceny is not a petty crime but an organized crime which is negatively affecting the sustainability of the agriculture sector in Antigua. The Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) conducted a comprehensive study, An Analysis of the State of Praedial Larceny in Member States of CARICOM, where it was observed that "conservative estimates are that 18% of the value of farm output regionally is taken by thieves, resulting in the loss of millions of United States dollars annually." [Praedial Larceny in the Caribbean, FAO Subregional Office for the Caribbean Issue #3 July 2013, p. 2]

Please join our campaign to purchase security fences to protect this tropical fruit farm from praedial larceny so that it can be successfully cultivated into a tropical organic fruit and vegetable farm using sustainable agriculture methods.

We would truly appreciate your generous contribution in helping fence this tropical fruit farm with security fences and you would be joining the fight against praedial larceny in the Caribbean in general and Antigua in particular.

THE PROJECT FOR FENCING THE TROPICAL FRUIT FARM AT CLAREMONT ANTIGUA W.I. IS DIVIDED INTO TWO PHASES:

1.  PHASE I - $40,000.00:  We hope to raise $40,000 to purchase security fences to protect two-third of the perimeter at the main asphalt road  which is equivalent to 285 security fences. 

The following pictures show part of the perimeter of the fruit farm at the main asphalt road that, hopefully with your help, will be fenced to deter praedial larcenists.



2.  PHASE II - $70,000.00: If we are successful with PHASE I, we will continue to raise funds (inter alia through crowdfunding) to protect the rest of the fruit farm perimeter. If we raised in PHASE II $70,000.00, we will be able to purchase 500 security fences. Then this tropical fruit farm will be completely protected against praedial larceny. 

DESCRIPTION OF THE SECURITY FENCES:

The security fences are low carbon steel wires which are galvanized after welding with a coating of zinc. This zinc coating protects the fence from corrosion due to aging and weather. The rectangular narrow openings make it impossible for fingers and toes to grab (Anti-Climb) or difficult or impossible to cut (Anti-Cut). The fences require very little maintenance as they do not need to be painted or stained. They also cannot rust or rot. See an enlarged illustration of a security fence below, use with permission.

THE SIZE OF THE ANTI-CLIMB/ANTI-CUT SECURITY FENCE FRAME IS:

91” Wide X 98” High (Height 2.5m x Width 2.3m), the wire mesh is 0.5”x3” horizontal wire dia 0.157 inch vertical wire dia 0.236 inch. Post size is about: 122X3X2X0.10 inches (3100X80X60X2.5mm).

DESCRIPTION OF THE PERKS:

We have prepared some UNIQUE PERKS as TOKENS OF OUR HUMBLE GRATITUDE! The main idea behind SOME OF the perks is for you to leave your lasting mark (WHEREVER YOU ARE IN THE WORLD) on this tropical fruit farm as LASTING EVIDENCE of your contribution IN ITS SUCCESS, through engrave of your name, country, and inspirational message on metal plaques placed on either: (1) the security fences you helped purchase; (2) volcanic rocks on the landscape of the fruit farm; (3) on one of the  240 plates  of a  24’’X48” perpetual outdoor metal plaque wall or (4) at the entrance and exit of the rainwater stream. In addition, you will receive a digital photo of the above mentioned perks as proof of compliance with the perks requirements plus one or two of the other unique perks.

  1. A Personal Thank You Note sent via email.

  2. STICKERS: 4’’ by 6’’ Oval and 3” Circle Bumper Stickers Black or Yellow

  3. LEATHER KEYCHAIN with inscription: “HANDS-OFF MY PRODUCE!”

     


  4. T-SHIRT with the Design below: “Fence Tropical Fruit Farm  – Stop Praedial Larceny Now!”


  5. Cotton Canvas Tote Bag: 13"h x 17"w x 5"dimension, with inside zipper pocket printed with a design similar to sticker #2, representing the colors of the flag of Antigua.

  6. Your name, country and inspirational inscription listed on one of the  240 plates  of a  24’’X48” perpetual outdoor metal plaque wall, which will be displayed at the main entrance of this tropical fruit farm.

  7. A metal plaque with your name, country and inspirational message welded on a security fence as a lasting recognition of your contribution.

  8. Your Mark on a Volcanic Rock!

  9. Rainwater stream Perk, You Name IT!

  10. ONE YEAR SUPPLY OF FRUITS IN SEASON: You will receive a reasonable  quantity of the fruits in season.

  11. CAMPING ADVENTURE FOR EVERYONE!: This perk is great for both locals as well as foreigners who love the great outdoors and enjoy camping. The fruit farm is located not too far from several beautiful beaches, Antigua Rainforest Canopy Tour (Zipline), walking through Walling Dam (rainforest hike), and walking distance from Fig Tree Drive. This perk can also come in handy for girl or boy scout organizations, pathfinders organizations, family outdoors vacation (very low budget), college students, other organizations retreats etc. It is valid for a group of 2 - 5 persons for 5 days. This perk is valid for 5 years, starting at the completion date of fencing of the entire fruit farm. This is important to ensure the safety of the campers. We do not want you to have any encounters with praedial larcenists. This will not be part of the great outdoor adventure on this tropical fruit farm.

2.3m), the wire mesh is 0.5”x3” horizontal wire dia 0.157 inch vertical wire
dia 0.236 inch.
Post size is about:
122X3X2X0.10 inches (3100X80X60X2.5mm).





DESCRIPTION OF THE PERKS:We have prepared some UNIQUE PERKS as TOKENS OF
OUR HUMBLE GRATITUDE! The main idea behind SOME OF the perks is for you to
leave your lasting mark (WHEREVER YOU
ARE IN THE WORLD) on this tropical fruit farm as LASTING
EVIDENCE of your contribution IN ITS
SUCCESS, through
engrave of your name, country, and inspirational message on metal plaques
placed on either: (1) the security fences you helped purchase; (2) volcanic
rocks on the landscape of the fruit farm; (3) on one of the  240
plates  of a  24’’X48” perpetual outdoor metal plaque wall
or (4) at the entrance and exit of the rainwater stream. In addition, you will receive a
digital photo of the above mentioned perks as proof of compliance with the
perks requirements plus one or two of the other unique perks. 

A
 Personal Thank You Note sent via email. 

STICKERS: 4’’ by 6’’ Oval and 3” Circle
Bumper Stickers Black or Yellow





LEATHER KEYCHAIN with inscription: “HANDS-OFF MY PRODUCE!”
 



T-SHIRT with the Design below:
“Fence Tropical Fruit Farm  – Stop Praedial Larceny
Now!”







Cotton Canvas Tote Bag: 13"h x
17"w x 5"dimension, with inside zipper pocket
 printed with a design similar to sticker #2, representing the colors of the flag of Antigua.


Your name, country and inspirational inscription listed on one of the  240 plates  of a  24’’X48” perpetual
outdoor metal plaque wall, which will be displayed at the main entrance of this tropical fruit farm.





A metal plaque with your name, country and inspirational message welded on a security fence as a lasting recognition of your contribution.


Your Mark on a Volcanic Rock! 

Rainwater stream Perk, You Name IT! 

ONE YEAR SUPPLY OF FRUITS IN SEASON: You will receive a reasonable  quantity of the fruits in season.
CAMPING ADVENTURE FOR EVERYONE!: This perk is great
for both locals as well as foreigners who love the great outdoors and enjoy
camping. The fruit farm is located not too far from several beautiful beaches,
Antigua Rainforest Canopy Tour (Zipline), walking through Walling Dam
(rainforest hike), and walking distance from Fig Tree Drive. This perk can also
come in handy for girl or boy scout organizations, pathfinders organizations,
family outdoors vacation (very low budget), college students, other
organizations retreats etc. It is valid for a group of 2 - 5 persons for 5 days.
This perk is valid for 5 years, starting at the completion date of fencing of
the entire fruit farm. This is important to ensure the safety of the campers. We do
not want you to have any encounters with praedial larcenists. This will not be
part of the great outdoor adventure on this tropical fruit farm.

story:
THE GORGEOUS SPICE CLUB

If you love creating food people talk about, let The Gorgeous Spice Club inspire you with fresh spices, bespoke members-only blends, and a generous serving of spice culture, delivered right to your door every month.  

 

HOW IT WORKS

Each month, The Gorgeous Spice Club subscription will take you on a flavour adventure that those dusty little jars in the back of your cupboard could only dream of.  Starting with one essential spice as inspiration, here’s what you’ll get in each monthly package:

  • A fresh supply of our featured small-batch spice to rejuvenate your spice drawer, triple sealed in its own fabulous package (along with a clever reusable label in case you prefer your own container)
  • A supply of a bespoke members-only blend inspired by that same spice (they’re amazing… our first edition contains 17 ingredients!)
  • Recipes and serving suggestions, including our soon-to-be-legendary Popcorn Test

 

Members also receive The Gorgeous ‘Zine with each release. This monthly email is packed with articles about the origins of that month’s spice, its pop culture credentials, wellness benefits (all spices are delicious, but some are actually good for you, too!), insights from professional chefs, more recipes and serving ideas, links to cool spice accessories we’ve discovered, and even a streaming playlist to give your kitchen just the right spicy vibe.

                                                        

THE GORGEOUS SPICES

The Gorgeous Spice Company partners with independent spice merchants and craftspeople to source our spices and create our blends. With all of our products, our goal is to provide the purest and most intense flavour experience. That means each edition is made to order in small batches and shipped within just a few days of processing.

Our raw spices are processed to minimize stems and other non-essentials, and to make the most of the high oil content that gives them their flavour and aroma. This demands expert attention to things like processing temperature and even the speed at which spices are ground. It takes a little more time, and costs a little more than typical grocery store spices, but we think you’ll agree the results are more than worth it. Our blends are created with those same high-quality spices. 

 

Subscribe to The Gorgeous 'Zine! With each month’s spice release, we publish a newsletter chock full of curated articles, recipes and serving suggestions, and even a playlist to set the mood for your next creation. But you don’t need to be a member to receive it. Sign up here, and get a dash of Gorgeous in your in-box every month, absolutely free!

 

Two spice nerds, one spice, and a long lunch. Join us as for The Gorgeous Lunch Podcast as we discover the ultimate restaurant for experiencing each month’s featured spice, sample the food, and pester the chef for tips to make your kitchen more thrilling.

 

 

OUR GOAL: 500 CHARTER MEMBERS

Your support and feedback on this spice adventure is key. With your help, we can expand to ensure you have ready access to the most gorgeous spices in the world.   If you know someone who loves food and would hate to miss the opportunity to create thrilling recipes, please send them an invite using the below link. 

 

WHO WE ARE

Not surprisingly, The Gorgeous Spice Company was born over dinner (well, many dinners, if we’re honest). Like you, we love to cook, and we love to share meals with the people we care about. But over years of sharing food with friends, we began to notice that some dinners were more special than others, even if our guests were the same wonderful people. Our most fabulous evenings were the ones that ended with scribbled notes and promises to email recipes.

And the secret to doing that turns out to be spices.

That’s why we created The Gorgeous Spice Company: to constantly seek out fresh new ways to dazzle the people you cook for, and deliver them right to your door, along with all the information and inspiration you need to keep that conversation going until your next masterpiece.

Our mission - to make food fascinating!

The Gorgeous creators, Lindan and Louise share an unabashed love for tasty food, amazing kitchen gear and pop-culture. And, as you’ll come to know, they’ve got a bit of a popcorn addiction.

Visit our website at thegorgeous.co

 

 

Photo credit to Marco Verch

story:
Supherb is energy tea with zero caffeine that provides clean, herb-driven energy & induces quality sleep at night. 

 

 

 

Caffeine forces body to "forget" sleepiness temporarily by tricking our brain, but it doesn't actually re-energize our body.

To create energy, we need to restore ATP.

 

Supherb's main ingredients have been clinically proven to ramp up ATP production, fundamentally raising our energy level.

 

 

 

 

Bo-yak, more than just tea

Bo-yak is a restorative herbal drink with 2000 years of tradition in Korea. Supherb is the first in market to modernize & bring this hidden-gem to world.

 

 

 

 

 

No one drinks 3-4 cups of coffee a day from beginning.

But how have we become so dependent on coffee everyday?

 

And even with several cups of coffee, why are we still tired?

Answer is in afternoon caffeine.

Caffeine stays in our body for a long time (it takes 6 hours for just half of caffeine to dissolve in body), disrupting our good night sleep and thus making us more tired next day. 

So what do we do about it? 

Supherb can help.

 

 

 

 

Supherb introduces a blend of best Asian herbs specialized for building stamina & long-term energy. It might not be as instant as caffeine, but good vitals gradually accumulates in body to help break vicious cycle*

 

 

*Many feel the difference as fast as their 1st bottle, and 90% of beta testers felt more energetic after drinking it for 6 days.

 

 

  • Korean Red Ginseng: Ginsenoside, Amino Acid, Vitamin A, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, and Vitamin C. 
  • Rehmannia Root (Root of Foxglove flowers): Carbohydrate (energy source for our body), Amino Acid, Iron, and Zinc.
  • Poria Cocos (Type of dried mushroom): Iron, Magnesium, and Calcium.
  • Jujube (Dried fruit): Saponin, Amino Acid, Calcium, Vitamin C, and Vitamin B.
  • Pure Honey: Grade A

 

 
 

 

    Korean Red Ginseng, Rehmannia Root, and Poria Cocos are currently marketed as Dietary Supplements in a form of pills.

    What makes Supherb different than those pills? Absorption

     

    *Based on Physician's Desk Reference, page 1542

     

     

     

     

     

    We believe disclosing ingredient origin isn't enough.

    That's why every Supherb box is assigned with unique tracking number, with which you can check ingredient information at a next level:

     

     

     

     

     

    Natural sweetness from pure honey and jujube are balanced with Red Ginseng's dryness, creating a smooth but deep flavor that is delightful & refreshing. 

     

    "I was surprised by how good it tasted." 

    Seung L. (IL)

     

    "Not too bitter, but not too sweet either - just the right balance that I like!"

    Peter H. (CA)

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    We come from diverse backgrounds, from consumer goods to high-tech, but share a common goal: to modernize and rebrand Asian herbs to help more people discover the best Asian herbs.

     

     

     

    How we become sleepy

     

    How Caffeine Works

     

    Caffeine has similar structure as Adenosine that it can fit into receptors instead of Adenosine. By docking into receptors and blocking Adenosine to dock, caffeine can make us feel less sleepy.

    However, when receptors are clogged by caffeine, our body creates extra receptors, leading our body to require more caffeine to block more receptors (in other words, we become immune to caffeine). 

    This is why caffeine is not a fundamental solution to energize - it forces body to "forget" sleepiness temporarily by blocking Adenosine, but it doesn't actually re-energize our body. Furthermore, our body ultimately become immune to caffeine.

    Better way to energize is not to artificially block Adenosine, but to produce more ATP, our body's energy source. 

     

     

    How Supherb works

    Supherb’s main ingredient Red Ginseng has been clinically proven* to ramp up ATP production, fundamentally raising our energy level.

     

    *Related studies:
    1. Li XT, Chen R, Jin LM, Chen HY. Regulation on energy metabolism and protection on     mitochondria of Panax ginseng polysaccharide. Am J Chin Med. 
    2. John Zeqi Luo and Luguang Luo. Ginseng on Hyperglycemia: Effects and Mechanisms

     

     

     

    1. How often should I drink? 
      • 1-2 times a day
    2. How to store?
      • At room temperature or refrigerate it. Avoid direct sunlight.
    3. When should I drink it?
      • Supherb's original concept is for afternoon/night, but time of a day doesn’t matter – drink whenever you need a kick :)
    4. How much Korean Red Ginseng is contained?
      • A bottle of Supherb is made of 2 grams of Korean Red Ginseng, a daily dosage amount recommended by European medical standard (Reference: Complete German Commission E Monographs)
    5. Is Supherb FDA-compliant?
      • Yes, Supherb is manufactured from FDA-compliant factories. However please note the statements on this page have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
      • "FDA does not “approve” health care facilities, laboratories, or manufacturers. FDA does have authority to inspect regulated facilities to verify that they comply with applicable good manufacturing practice regulations." - FDA website
    6. Any other questions? 
      • drinksupherb@gmail.com

     

     

    To ensure quality, Supherb is manufactured in Korea, from FDA-compliant factory & technicians who has specialty in brewing herbs and “Boyak.” Since Supherb batches are shipped from Korea and goes through US customs, there is a risk of shipping to be delayed (2-3 weeks) if unexpected circumstances happen (e.g. US custom requires extra inspection)

     

    Share with Friends!

    We are a small team and just 10 seconds of your time to share our campaign is really a SIGNIFICANT help to drive our campaign!

     

     

    Don’t forget to tag #drinksupherb on your post - our team will leave a secret gift to the posts with tag #drinksupherb :)

     

     

    Thank you for checking out our campaign and reading it through here. You're officially done reading our campaign story :)

story:
We can't thank you enough for the support during our first campaign!  How sweet is your Supporters merch?  This campaign will have a different approach as its more for anyone who wants to join our Kick Back Club.

 

What is the Kick Back Club? It's our version of a "mug club".  You get a ton of perks and totally get your moneys worth.  Just click the perk for more details on our KBC!

 

For this campaign we are also launching our Pottsville Pride shirts.  It's our "Brewed in The Skook" shirts but in Pottsville area colors.  We now have them in maroon/white as well as green/yellow, for the area schools.  Check it out and thanks in advance!

story:
=== We've completed our Indiegogo/Pre-order Campaign ===

Thank you again for helping us get Morning Recovery off the ground! Moving forward, please visit our website directly to place your order.


Morning Recovery Team

 

Thank you for helping us get Morning Recovery off the ground!

Our Indiegogo campaign ended on Aug 6, 2017 with 940% of our original funding goal attained. We are now taking pre-orders via InDemand for a second batch of Morning Recovery drinks that are being mass produced and arriving in our warehouse in September.

Until September 10th, you can pre-order here and take advantage of our early-bird discount.

Starting September 11th, you can order directly from our website with shipment going out from our warehouse to you in the next day.

 

 

 

Morning Recovery is formulated to boost your body's natural response to alcohol. Drink it before going to bed and wake up feeling great.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We all have that friend that parties a little too hard... Let them in on Morning Recovery!

 

Skeptics speak... We gave Morning Recovery to hundreds of beta testers across the nation. Here's what they had to say.

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

"This miracle potion may just become your liver’s best friend."

 - Hayden Laimer, Liquor.com

 

"There must be a lot of people in the world who would say “cheers” to that.” 

- Julie Bort, Business Insider

 

"Morning Recovery though, sounds incredibly promising. All you need to do is drink it during or after a night of drinking." 

- Uncrate.com

 

Lee’s journey from computer engineer to a body and food “hacker” has echoes of Soylent founder Rob Rhinehart’s journey. Perhaps Lee’s Morning Recovery can spark a similar global food revolution."  

- Vaughn Highfield , Alphr

 

 

 

The worlds leading scientist in alcohol use disorder is on the Morning Recovery team.

 

 

 

Help us spread the word, we can't do this without your support! 

 

 

 

 

 

Sisun has worked as a Product Manager at Facebook, Uber and Tesla prior to starting Morning Recovery. His personal frustrations in dealing with rough mornings and the lack of remedies available in the marketplace led to the initial research and development for Morning Recovery.

 

 

 

#MorningRecoveryDrink

Like what you're seeing? Want to help us? Just 30 seconds of your time can make a huge difference. Hit the share button below and to tag a friend or co-worker who needs this!

 

We can't do this without you!

 

DHM

Morning Recovery is centered around Hovenia Dulcis, an Oriental raisin tree. It contains Dihydromyricetin (DHM) which has anti-hepatotoxic properties to help detoxify our body after alcohol poisoning.

1. Toxins in your liver

Alcohol undergoes a two-step process of metabolism in our liver:

A. First, our liver enzyme Alcohol Dehydrogenase (ADH) converts Alcohol into metabolite called Acetaldehyde through oxidation. Acetaldehyde binds to proteins, and causes cellular inflammation; resulting in sweating, nausea and vomiting. Sound familiar?

B. Luckily, our body is equipped with enzymes like Aldehyde-Dehydrogenase (ALDH) and glutathione that convert this toxic chemical into Acetic Acid that gets safely flushed out of our body.

Dihydromyricetin (DHM) works by increasing the ability of two key enzymes to function (ADH and ALDH), which speeds up the breakdown of Acetaldehyde into Acetic Acid. Consuming Morning Recovery allows your body to flush out acetaldehyde.

 

2. Glutamate rebound in our brain

In our brain, alcohol affects two neurotransmitters: Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid (GABA) and Glutamate.

 

 

A. Alcohol binds to GABA receptors, and increases GABA production, an inhibitor that causes relaxation, lowered inhibitions, slurred words and loss of motor control.

B. This, in turn, suppresses the release of Glutamate, an excitatory neurotransmitter that increases brain activity and energy levels. When you stop drinking, there's a rebound effect of glutamate production, which is why we fall asleep easily at first, but often wake up tired with anxiety.

Dihydromyricetin (DHM) binds to GABA receptors, and blocks the effect alcohol has on the brain. It minimizes the rebound effect our brain experiences after consuming alcohol.

 

 

FAQ's

 

Why should I back it now?

  • Take advantage of our huge discount available on Indiegogo! Our retail price will become $5 USD per bottle once Indiegogo campaign is completed in Aug 5.
  • Be among the first in the world to get a solution to your rough mornings!

 

When is the best time to consume Morning Recovery?

  • Based on the formulation of the product, Morning Recovery should be taken while or immediately after consuming alcohol. Don’t worry if you forget. You can drink Morning Recovery before bed to avoid rough mornings.

 

What's in the formula?

  • Morning Recovery is centered around Hovenia Dulcis extracts carrying DHM. It also contains Vitamin B complex, Milk thistle, Prickly pear extract, and Taurine blended in a liquid full of electrolytes.
  • We make sure we only use the most active and absorbable form of our ingredients rather than opting for cheaper forms. We test to ensure that what’s in the product is exactly what’s on our label.

 

What is DHM?

  • DHM stands for Dihydromyricetin. It is a natural enzyme found in Hovenia Dulcis and Rattan Tea that help dissipate the lingering effects of alcohol.

 

Where can I find additional studies on DHM?

  • i. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24676702
  • ii. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC32...
  • iii. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26751438

 

Where is Morning Recovery manufactured?

  • Morning Recovery is currently manufactured in South Korea in accordance with Korean GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice).

 

Is Morning Recovery FDA approved?

  • Morning Recovery is a dietary supplement, and is FDA compliant. This means that the ingredients used are considered safe within the FDA monograph system. Additionally, every step of Morning Recovery’s sourcing, testing, and manufacturing complies with the requirements set forth in the FDA regulations.

 

Is Morning Recovery available internationally?

  • Yes! But additional shipping charges will apply.

 

How do I contact you for more questions?

  • Email team@morningrecoverydrink.com or message us on Facebook.

 

Can I purchase Morning Recovery in bulk?

  • Yes! Email wholesale@morningrecovery.com.

 

 

 

Wholesale Purchase Agreement

 

We offer Wholesale Purchase Agreement for distributors looking to resell Morning Recovery in their respective markets. In order to become our distributor, you must sign and submit our Wholesale Purchase Agreement.

Shipping and Freight

International purchasers will be responsible for all Merchandise shipping and handling expenses, including (if applicable), customs clearance, import/export fees, freight risks and insurance, and Purchaser may be required to act as the importer of record for international shipments. 

Purchaser’s Representations

Purchaser, nor its agents and/or representatives, shall not violate any United States federal or state laws, international laws, rules or regulations in the purchase, sale or resale of the Merchandise.

Retail Price

Morning Recovery will be sold at $5 USD per bottle once Indiegogo campaign is completed on Aug 5.

 

 
 
 

On behalf of the Morning Recovery crew, thank you for your support!
story_txt:
=== We've completed our Indiegogo/Pre-order Campaign ===Thank you again for helping us get Morning Recovery off the ground! Moving forward, please visit our website directly to place your order.Morning Recovery Team Thank you for helping us get Morning Recovery off the ground!Our Indiegogo campaign ended on Aug 6, 2017 with 940% of our original funding goal attained. We are now taking pre-orders via InDemand for a second batch of Morning Recovery drinks that are being mass produced and arriving in our warehouse in September.Until September 10th, you can pre-order here and take advantage of our early-bird discount.Starting September 11th, you can order directly from our website with shipment going out from our warehouse to you in the next day.   Morning Recovery is formulated to boost your body's natural response to alcohol. Drink it before going to bed and wake up feeling great.         We all have that friend that parties a little too hard... Let them in on Morning Recovery! Skeptics speak... We gave Morning Recovery to hundreds of beta testers across the nation. Here's what they had to say.




 


 


 
 

 
 

 

 
"This miracle potion may just become your liver’s best friend."
 - Hayden Laimer, Liquor.com
 
"There must be a lot of people in the world who would say “cheers” to that.” 
- Julie Bort, Business Insider
 
"Morning Recovery though, sounds incredibly promising. All you need to do is drink it during or after a night of drinking." 
- Uncrate.com
 
Lee’s journey from computer engineer to a body and food “hacker” has echoes of Soylent founder Rob Rhinehart’s journey. Perhaps Lee’s Morning Recovery can spark a similar global food revolution."  
- Vaughn Highfield , Alphr
 
 


 The worlds leading scientist in alcohol use disorder is on the Morning Recovery team.   Help us spread the word, we can't do this without your support!      Sisun has worked as a Product Manager at Facebook, Uber and Tesla prior to starting Morning Recovery. His personal frustrations in dealing with rough mornings and the lack of remedies available in the marketplace led to the initial research and development for Morning Recovery.   #MorningRecoveryDrinkLike what you're seeing? Want to help us? Just 30 seconds of your time can make a huge difference. Hit the share button below and to tag a friend or co-worker who needs this! We can't do this without you! 
DHM
Morning Recovery is centered around Hovenia Dulcis, an Oriental raisin tree. It contains Dihydromyricetin (DHM) which has anti-hepatotoxic properties to help detoxify our body after alcohol poisoning.

1. Toxins in your liver
Alcohol undergoes a two-step process of metabolism in our liver:

A. First, our liver enzyme Alcohol Dehydrogenase (ADH) converts Alcohol into metabolite called Acetaldehyde through oxidation. Acetaldehyde binds to proteins, and causes cellular inflammation; resulting in sweating, nausea and vomiting. Sound familiar?
B. Luckily, our body is equipped with enzymes like Aldehyde-Dehydrogenase (ALDH) and glutathione that convert this toxic chemical into Acetic Acid that gets safely flushed out of our body.
Dihydromyricetin (DHM) works by increasing the ability of two key enzymes to function (ADH and ALDH), which speeds up the breakdown of Acetaldehyde into Acetic Acid. Consuming Morning Recovery allows your body to flush out acetaldehyde.
 
2. Glutamate rebound in our brain
In our brain, alcohol affects two neurotransmitters: Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid (GABA) and Glutamate.
 

 
A. Alcohol binds to GABA receptors, and increases GABA production, an inhibitor that causes relaxation, lowered inhibitions, slurred words and loss of motor control.
B. This, in turn, suppresses the release of Glutamate, an excitatory neurotransmitter that increases brain activity and energy levels. When you stop drinking, there's a rebound effect of glutamate production, which is why we fall asleep easily at first, but often wake up tired with anxiety.
Dihydromyricetin (DHM) binds to GABA receptors, and blocks the effect alcohol has on the brain. It minimizes the rebound effect our brain experiences after consuming alcohol.
 

 
FAQ's
 
Why should I back it now?

Take advantage of our huge discount available on Indiegogo! Our retail price will become $5 USD per bottle once Indiegogo campaign is completed in Aug 5.
Be among the first in the world to get a solution to your rough mornings!

 
When is the best time to consume Morning Recovery?
Based on the formulation of the product, Morning Recovery should be taken while or immediately after consuming alcohol. Don’t worry if you forget. You can drink Morning Recovery before bed to avoid rough mornings.
 
What's in the formula?

Morning Recovery is centered around Hovenia Dulcis extracts carrying DHM. It also contains Vitamin B complex, Milk thistle, Prickly pear extract, and Taurine blended in a liquid full of electrolytes.
We make sure we only use the most active and absorbable form of our ingredients rather than opting for cheaper forms. We test to ensure that what’s in the product is exactly what’s on our label.

 
What is DHM?
DHM stands for Dihydromyricetin. It is a natural enzyme found in Hovenia Dulcis and Rattan Tea that help dissipate the lingering effects of alcohol.
 
Where can I find additional studies on DHM?

i. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24676702

ii. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC32...

iii. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26751438


 
Where is Morning Recovery manufactured?
Morning Recovery is currently manufactured in South Korea in accordance with Korean GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice).
 
Is Morning Recovery FDA approved?
Morning Recovery is a dietary supplement, and is FDA compliant. This means that the ingredients used are considered safe within the FDA monograph system. Additionally, every step of Morning Recovery’s sourcing, testing, and manufacturing complies with the requirements set forth in the FDA regulations.
 
Is Morning Recovery available internationally?
Yes! But additional shipping charges will apply.
 
How do I contact you for more questions?
Email team@morningrecoverydrink.com or message us on Facebook.
 
Can I purchase Morning Recovery in bulk?
Yes! Email wholesale@morningrecovery.com.
 

 



 
Wholesale Purchase Agreement
 
We offer Wholesale Purchase Agreement for distributors looking to resell Morning Recovery in their respective markets. In order to become our distributor, you must sign and submit our Wholesale Purchase Agreement.
Shipping and Freight
International purchasers will be responsible for all Merchandise shipping and handling expenses, including (if applicable), customs clearance, import/export fees, freight risks and insurance, and Purchaser may be required to act as the importer of record for international shipments. 
Purchaser’s Representations
Purchaser, nor its agents and/or representatives, shall not violate any United States federal or state laws, international laws, rules or regulations in the purchase, sale or resale of the Merchandise.
Retail Price
Morning Recovery will be sold at $5 USD per bottle once Indiegogo campaign is completed on Aug 5.


 

 

 
 


On behalf of the Morning Recovery crew, thank you for your support!

story:
Acerca de Nosotros:

  • Somos la alianza de Caffte Global SA y CoopeAgri RL. La cooperativa de café se encuentra con la tecnología futuristica del café.

 

  • Estamos entusiasmados de compartir los primeros 3000 kilos de MocaMagic Tradicional (cosecha Cerro Chirripo 2017-18 ) y ahora estamos tomando pedidos en una modalidad de preventa de la cosecha 2018-19)


     
  • Respaldar este proyecto significa que nos ayudará a transformar la industria del café hacia una industria más sostenible. El estudio realizado de nuestro nuevo proceso por el experto y consultor ambiental internacional Tony Nello, demostro la reducción  90% del huella de Carbono y un 85% de la huella hidrica. ​


Esta no es una propuesta de café de mejora, esta es una forma completamente nueva de usar café y cacao.

Este proceso es desconocido por otras Cooperativas de cafe a nivel mundial. El futuro y la causa de MocaMagic es que todos usemos el Cafe Integral! y asi salvemos la crisis económica presente en el sector cafetalero global.

Estamos llenos optimismo de que en realidad  es posible salvar la situacion del cafetalero nacional gracias a el progreso hasta el momento:
 

Linea de Tiempo:
 


Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Iniciar una cadena de suministro desde cero y crear un producto completamente nuevo son retos grandes y costosos a nivel de inversion.

La buena noticia es que ya hemos recaudado los fondos que necesitábamos para la fábrica a través de nuestra Cooperativa y Caffte Global.

Pero necesitamos $17000 más para desarrollar la capacitación para los agricultores que ahora tratarán sus cosechas de una manera diferente este 2018 para garantizar los más altos niveles de nutrición y para diseñar e imprimir los paquetes para mercado nacional e internacional.



Varios socios estratégicos han acordado lanzar MocaMagic a nivel nacional e internacional, solo necesitamos esos elementos clave para poder escalar produccion

Tenemos fantasticas maneras con la que puedes respaldar el projecto MocaMagic, incluida una excursion extrema a la Montaña Chirripó (el pico más alto de Centroamérica), entradas VIP para festivales de transformación como Envision Festival 2019 y Costa Rica Fruitfest 2018, ¡y más!

El Impacto Social-económico
 

Promovemos un modelo agroeconómico que conecta productores y consumidores en base a un modelo TRIPLE-VIA de COMERCIO JUSTO:
 

  1.  MÁS VALOR COMERCIAL PARA EL PRODUCTOR: El cafetalero se le reconoce la Fruta del cafe y su trato al cosecharlo.

     
  2.  MÁS VALOR NUTRICIONAL PARA LOS CONSUMIDORES: Esta poderosa combinacion aporta el espectro total de polifenoles que son conocidos por mejorar capacidades cerebrales y metabilicas.

     
  3.  MÁS SOSTENIBLE PARA EL MEDIO AMBIENTE: esta nueva forma de utilizar el café y el cacao elimina el 90% de la huella de carbono y el 85% de los desechos de recursos hídricos presentes en manera convencional actual.

Nuestra visión de meradeo es ofrecer MocaMagic directamente en internet y conectar cooperativas y asociaciones de consumidores con cooperativas y asociaciones de productores de todo el mundo que cuentan con certificación de Comercio Justo y promueven el cultivo intensivo de café y cacao.
 

 

Puedes ayudar de otras formas

Algunos de ustedes no pueden contribuir, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:

  • Corré la voz y comparta con sus amigos y familia nuestra campaña. si conoce a alguien que está listo para ser el primer negocio en utilizar nuestra nueva materia prima como ingrediente en sus productos, avísenos al 87132635.
     
  • Comparta la campaña a través de las herramientas de compartir de Indiegogo a sus amigos en FACEBOOK, y por medio de correo electronico, arriba debajo de la pizarra de recaudacion estan los botones para que asi puedas GANAR premios por referir a tus amigos.
  • Visita coopeagri.mocamagic.com para mas videos y informacion en caso de que seas cafetalero y querias saber como participar en este programa de valor agregado a tu cafetal

Nuestra Formula es muy facil! Y muy deliciosa. Mira lo que ya estan diciendo de nuestro producto:

 

 


 


​

GRACIAS de PARTE DE LA FAMILIA DE COOPEAGRI!
